input: Our results suggest, but do not confirm, that a possible advantage of ultrasound guidance for the first attempt success rate over other techniques is more pronounced in infants and small children than in older children.
output: Our research shows that ultrasound guidance may help with the success rate of the first attempt more in babies and younger children than in older children, but more research is needed to be sure.
gold: La evidencia indica que la ecografía es superior a otras técnicas para la inserción de catéteres arteriales, en particular en los recién nacidos y los niños pequeños.
translated_output: Nuestra investigación muestra que la guía por ultrasonido puede ayudar con la tasa de éxito del primer intento más en bebés y niños pequeños que en niños mayores, pero se necesita más investigación para estar seguros.
old_gold: Our evidence suggests that ultrasound is superior to other techniques for arterial catheter insertion, particularly in babies and young children.

input: Laparoscopic box model training appears to improve technical skills compared with no training in trainees with no previous laparoscopic experience.
output: This sentence means that when people who have never done laparoscopic surgery before get trained on a special type of model, they get better at laparoscopic surgery than people who don't get that training.
gold: Lo anterior indica que el entrenamiento con simulador mejora las aptitudes técnicas de los cirujanos practicantes sin experiencia previa en cirugía laparoscópica.
translated_output: Esta oración significa que cuando las personas que nunca antes han realizado una cirugía laparoscópica se capacitan en un tipo especial de modelo, mejoran en la cirugía laparoscópica que las personas que no reciben esa capacitación.
old_gold: This suggests that the box model training improves technical skills of surgical trainees with no previous experience in laparoscopic surgery.

input: We also searched Google Scholar and performed manual searches in journals relevant to the topic, conference proceedings and lists of references of potentially included articles.
output: We looked up information on the topic using Google Scholar, which is a special type of search engine. Then we read through articles in books and magazines related to the topic, and looked through lists of articles that could be helpful.
gold: Se realizó una búsqueda exhaustiva de estudios sobre este tema.
translated_output: Buscamos información sobre el tema usando Google Scholar, que es un tipo especial de motor de búsqueda. Luego leímos artículos en libros y revistas relacionados con el tema, y revisamos listas de artículos que podrían ser útiles.
old_gold: We conducted a comprehensive search for studies on this topic.

input: The focus of treatment has moved to an outpatient setting, and a number of differing psychological therapies are presently used in treatment.
output: Treatment for people who are not staying in a hospital is becoming more common now, and different kinds of therapy are being used to help people get better.
gold: Es importante saber qué terapia psicológica tiene más probabilidades de ayudar a los pacientes a recuperarse.
translated_output: El tratamiento para las personas que no están internadas en un hospital se está volviendo más común ahora y se están utilizando diferentes tipos de terapia para ayudar a las personas a mejorar.
old_gold: It is important to know which psychological therapy is most likely to help people recover.

input: Pain relief did not differ between Mm/r and MIR.
output: The amount of pain relief that both Mm/r and MIR provided was the same.
gold: lo cual dificultó la posibilidad de determinar si algún comprimido o preparado oral con morfina fue mejor que otro.
translated_output: La cantidad de alivio del dolor que proporcionaron tanto Mm/r como MIR fue la misma.
old_gold: This made it difficult to work out whether any one tablet or preparation of oral morphine was better than any other.

input: Duration and style of tai chi differed between trials.
output: The time it took and the way it was done changed between each time they tried tai chi.
gold: Hubo variaciones en la duración y el estilo del tai chi y el seguimiento de las intervenciones varió de tres a 12 meses.
translated_output: El tiempo que tomó y la forma en que se hizo cambió entre cada vez que probaron tai chi.
old_gold: There were variations in the duration and style of tai chi and the follow-up of the interventions ranged from three to 12 months.

input: There was some suggestion of beneficial effects of tai chi on CVD risk factors but this was not consistent across all studies.
output: Different studies have looked at whether Tai Chi can help lower the risk of getting certain diseases of the heart and blood vessels, but not all of the studies have found the same results.
gold: Debido al escaso número de estudios a corto plazo y la variabilidad entre ellos, no fue posible determinar de manera concluyente si el tai chi fue beneficioso para reducir el riesgo cardiovascular en los adultos sanos y los adultos con mayor riesgo de EC, aunque en algunos estudios se observaron efectos beneficiosos sobre los factores de riesgo de EC.
translated_output: Diferentes estudios han analizado si el Tai Chi puede ayudar a reducir el riesgo de contraer ciertas enfermedades del corazón y los vasos sanguíneos, pero no todos los estudios han encontrado los mismos resultados.
old_gold: Due to the small number of short-term studies and the variability between them, we were unable to determine conclusively whether or not tai chi was beneficial at reducing cardiovascular risk in healthy adults and adults at increased risk of CVD, although beneficial effects for CVD risk factors were seen in some studies.

input: Published or unpublished randomised controlled trials (RCTs) comparing the effects of anabolic steroids with alternative treatments or different types of anabolic steroids in the treatment of pressure ulcers.
output: Researchers are studying whether anabolic steroids (special medicine) can help heal pressure ulcers (sores that don’t heal easily). They are comparing the effects of anabolic steroids to other treatments and to different types of anabolic steroids.
gold: En marzo de 2017, se buscaron los ensayos controlados aleatorizados que compararon la administración de esteroides anabolizantes con otros tratamientos para las úlceras por presión.
translated_output: Los investigadores están estudiando si los esteroides anabólicos (medicina especial) pueden ayudar a curar las úlceras por presión (llagas que no se curan fácilmente). Están comparando los efectos de los esteroides anabólicos con otros tratamientos y con diferentes tipos de esteroides anabólicos.
old_gold: In March 2017, we searched for randomised controlled trials, which compared the use of anabolic steroids with other treatments for pressure ulcers.

input: We searched the Cochrane Hypertension Group Specialised Register, the Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials (CENTRAL, 2014, Issue 9), MEDLINE, MEDLINE In-Process, EMBASE, and ClinicalTrials.gov to 27 October 2014.
output: We looked for studies about hypertension in many different places, including the Cochrane Hypertension Group Specialised Register, the Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials, MEDLINE, MEDLINE In-Process, EMBASE, and ClinicalTrials.gov, up to October 27, 2014.
gold: Se realizaron búsquedas en la literatura científica disponible para encontrar todos los ensayos que habían evaluado esta pregunta.
translated_output: Buscamos estudios sobre hipertensión en muchos lugares diferentes, incluido el Registro Especializado del Grupo Cochrane de Hipertensión, el Registro Central Cochrane de Ensayos Controlados, MEDLINE, MEDLINE In-Process, EMBASE y ClinicalTrials.gov, hasta el 27 de octubre de 2014.
old_gold: We searched the available scientific literature to find all the trials that had addressed these questions.

input: To determine the effectiveness of tai chi for the primary prevention of CVD.
output: This sentence is asking if tai chi (a type of exercise) can help keep people from getting heart and blood vessel diseases.
gold: Esta revisión evaluó la efectividad de las intervenciones de tai chi en adultos sanos y adultos con alto riesgo de EC para reducir la muerte cardiovascular, la muerte por cualquier causa, las variables de evaluación no mortales (como ataques cardíacos, accidentes cerebrovasculares y angina) y los factores de riesgo de EC.
translated_output: Esta oración pregunta si el tai chi (un tipo de ejercicio) puede ayudar a evitar que las personas contraigan enfermedades del corazón y de los vasos sanguíneos.
old_gold: This review assessed the effectiveness of tai chi interventions for healthy adults and adults at high risk of CVD at reducing cardiovascular death, all-cause death, non-fatal endpoints (such as heart attacks, strokes and angina) and CVD risk factors.

input: High-quality randomised controlled trials on well-defined participants with long-term outcomes to determine the duration of response are needed.
output: We need to do experiments with carefully chosen people to find out how long the effect of something will last. The experiments need to be done carefully, using the best methods, and the results need to be tracked over a long period of time.
gold: Se necesitan estudios de alta calidad que comparen los tratamientos para esta afección difícil de tratar.
translated_output: Necesitamos hacer experimentos con personas cuidadosamente seleccionadas para averiguar cuánto durará el efecto de algo. Los experimentos deben realizarse con cuidado, utilizando los mejores métodos, y los resultados deben rastrearse durante un largo período de tiempo.
old_gold: There is a need for high-quality studies comparing the treatments for this difficult to manage condition.

input: The cure rate in short-term follow-up was similar between the groups, however there is significant uncertainty in this result due to the high heterogeneity.
output: The two groups of people being studied had the same rate of getting better in the short-term. However, the results of this study may not be accurate because the groups were very different from each other.
gold: La curación en el momento del seguimiento a corto plazo fue similar entre los grupos; sin embargo, hay dudas significativas en cuanto a este resultado que pueden ser consecuencia de la antigüedad de uno de los estudios y del agente diferente utilizado en comparación con los otros estudios.
translated_output: Los dos grupos de personas que se estaban estudiando tenían la misma tasa de mejora a corto plazo. Sin embargo, los resultados de este estudio pueden no ser precisos porque los grupos eran muy diferentes entre sí.
old_gold: Cure at short-term follow-up was similar between the groups, however there is significant uncertainty in this result which may be as a result of the age of one of the studies and the different agent used compared to the other studies.

input: We did not find any completed randomised trials.
output: We looked for studies that were randomly chosen and finished, but we did not find any.
gold: No se encontraron ensayos aleatorios finalizados que probaran estos fármacos en pacientes con disección carotídea.
translated_output: Buscamos estudios que se eligieron al azar y terminaron, pero no encontramos ninguno.
old_gold: We did not find any completed randomised trials testing these drugs in people with carotid artery dissection.

input: The rates were 24.5 for the sponge and 10.9 for the diaphragm in the UK trial.
output: In the UK trial, it cost 24.5 pounds to buy a sponge and 10.9 pounds to buy a diaphragm.
gold: De cada 100 mujeres que utilizaron la esponja durante un año, unas 25 quedaron embarazadas.
translated_output: En la prueba del Reino Unido, costó 24,5 libras comprar una esponja y 10,9 libras comprar un diafragma.
old_gold: For each 100 women who used the sponge for a year, about 25 got pregnant.

input: All but one trial were at high risk of bias.
output: Out of all the trials, only one was not likely to be influenced by bias.
gold: Todos los ensayos excepto uno presentaron un alto riesgo de sesgo (defectos en el diseño del estudio que pueden dar lugar a conclusiones incorrectas, es decir, sobrestimación de los efectos beneficiosos y subestimación de los efectos perjudiciales).
translated_output: De todos los ensayos, era probable que sólo uno no estuviera influenciado por el sesgo.
old_gold: All but one of the trials were of high risk of bias (defects in study design that can lead to arriving at incorrect conclusions with overestimation of benefits and underestimation of harms).

input: To assess interventions used in the management of all types of melasma: epidermal, dermal, and mixed.
output: To figure out what treatments work best for the different types of melasma (a skin condition), like the kind that affects the top layer of skin, the kind that affects the layer below the top layer, and the kind that affects both layers.
gold: El melasma mixto es una combinación del melasma epidérmico y dérmico.
translated_output: Para averiguar qué tratamientos funcionan mejor para los diferentes tipos de melasma (una afección de la piel), como el tipo que afecta la capa superior de la piel, el tipo que afecta la capa debajo de la capa superior y el tipo que afecta ambas capas.
old_gold: Mixed melasma is a combination of epidermal and dermal melasma.

input: We included seven trials, involving 735 participants, in this review.
output: This review looked at seven different experiments that included a total of 735 people taking part.
gold: Esta revisión incluyó siete estudios (específicamente ensayos controlados aleatorizados), en los que participaron 735 pacientes.
translated_output: Esta revisión analizó siete experimentos diferentes que incluyeron un total de 735 personas que participaron.
old_gold: This review included seven studies (specifically randomised controlled trials), involving 735 people.

input: Surgeons and their assistants are especially at risk of exposure to blood due to glove perforations and needle stick injuries during operations.
output: Surgeons and the people who help them are more likely than other people to come into contact with blood, because sometimes their gloves and needles used during surgery can get holes in them.
gold: Estas lesiones pueden causar infección por VIH u otros virus transmitidos por la sangre.
translated_output: Los cirujanos y las personas que los ayudan tienen más probabilidades que otras personas de entrar en contacto con la sangre, porque a veces los guantes y las agujas que se usan durante la cirugía pueden perforarlos.
old_gold: This can lead to infection with HIV or other blood-borne viruses.

input: Fibrates are a class of drugs characterised by mainly lowering high triglyceride, raising high-density lipoprotein (HDL) cholesterol, and lowering the small dense fraction of low-density lipoprotein (LDL) cholesterol.
output: Fibrates are medicines that help lower your cholesterol. They help lower bad cholesterol (LDL) and raise good cholesterol (HDL). They also help to lower the amount of triglycerides in your blood.
gold: Los fibratos son una clase de fármacos que funcionan al influir positivamente en las grasas de la sangre, es decir, reducen los triglicéridos, aumentan el colesterol de lipoproteína de alta densidad ("bueno") y disminuyen la fracción densa pequeña del colesterol de lipoproteína de baja densidad ("malo").
translated_output: Los fibratos son medicamentos que ayudan a reducir el colesterol. Ayudan a reducir el colesterol malo (LDL) y aumentan el colesterol bueno (HDL). También ayudan a reducir la cantidad de triglicéridos en la sangre.
old_gold: Fibrates are a class of drugs that work by positively influencing fats in the the blood, that is lowering triglyceride, raising high-density lipoprotein ('good') cholesterol and lowering the small dense fraction of low-density lipoprotein ('bad') cholesterol.

input: To assess the effects of anabolic steroids for treating pressure ulcers.
output: To look at how taking anabolic steroids affects healing pressure sores.
gold: Se deseaba determinar si los esteroides anabolizantes fueron efectivos en el tratamiento de las úlceras por presión y si provocaron algún efecto perjudicial.
translated_output: Para ver cómo la toma de esteroides anabólicos afecta la cicatrización de las úlceras por presión.
old_gold: We wanted to find out whether anabolic steroids were effective in treating pressure ulcers, and if they had any harmful effects.

input: More RCTs are required to assess whether brief co-incubation would contribute to a higher live birth rate and a lower miscarriage rate compared to the standard overnight insemination protocol.
output: Scientists need to do more experiments to find out if leaving the sperm and egg together for a shorter time than usual might help more babies be born healthy and fewer pregnancies end in miscarriage.
gold: Se necesitan más estudios para evaluar si la coincubación breve contribuye a una tasa mayor de nacidos vivos y a una menor de aborto espontáneo en comparación con protocolo estándar de inseminación durante la noche.
translated_output: Los científicos necesitan hacer más experimentos para averiguar si dejar el esperma y el óvulo juntos durante un tiempo más corto de lo habitual podría ayudar a que más bebés nazcan sanos y que menos embarazos terminen en aborto espontáneo.
old_gold: More studies are needed to assess whether brief co-incubation would contribute to a higher live-birth rate and a lower miscarriage rate compared to the standard overnight insemination protocol.

input: Laparoscopic box model training appears to improve technical skills compared with no training in trainees with no previous laparoscopic experience.
output: This sentence is saying that if people who have never done laparoscopic surgery before practice using a special model, their skill with laparoscopic surgery will be better compared to people who don't practice at all.
gold: El entrenamiento con simulador parece disminuir el tiempo requerido para realizar una tarea laparoscópica, mejorar la exactitud, y disminuir los errores, y mejora el rendimiento general.
translated_output: Esta oración dice que si las personas que nunca antes han realizado una cirugía laparoscópica practican usando un modelo especial, su habilidad con la cirugía laparoscópica será mejor en comparación con las personas que no practican en absoluto.
old_gold: Box model training appears to decrease the time required to perform a laparoscopic task, improve the accuracy, decrease the errors, and improves the overall performance.

input: Nine trials measured blood pressure, six individual trials found reductions in SBP (reductions ranged from -22.0 mmHg (95% confidence interval (CI) -26.3 to -17.7) to -11.5 mmHg (95% CI -21.5 to -1.46)), two trials found no clear evidence of a difference (however, CIs were wide and an increase or decrease in SBP cannot be ruled out), and one trial found an increase in SBP with tai chi (increase 5.2 mmHg, 95% CI 3.73 to 6.67).
output: Nine studies were done to measure people's blood pressure. Six of the studies showed that people's blood pressure went down, and the amount of the decrease ranged from a little bit (-11.5 mmHg) to a lot (-22.0 mmHg). Two of the studies did not show a clear change in blood pressure, but it's possible that it could have gone up or down. The last study showed that people's blood pressure went up by 5.2 mmHg.
gold: Debido al escaso número de estudios a corto plazo y la variabilidad entre ellos, no fue posible determinar de manera concluyente si el tai chi fue beneficioso para reducir el riesgo cardiovascular en los adultos sanos y los adultos con mayor riesgo de EC, aunque en algunos estudios se observaron efectos beneficiosos sobre los factores de riesgo de EC.
translated_output: Se realizaron nueve estudios para medir la presión arterial de las personas. Seis de los estudios mostraron que la presión arterial de las personas disminuyó, y la cantidad de disminución varió de un poco (-11,5 mmHg) a mucho (-22,0 mmHg). Dos de los estudios no mostraron un cambio claro en la presión arterial, pero es posible que haya subido o bajado. El último estudio mostró que la presión arterial de las personas aumentó 5,2 mmHg.
old_gold: Due to the small number of short-term studies and the variability between them, we were unable to determine conclusively whether or not tai chi was beneficial at reducing cardiovascular risk in healthy adults and adults at increased risk of CVD, although beneficial effects for CVD risk factors were seen in some studies.

input: To assess the efficacy and safety of fibrates for the prevention of serious vascular events in people with previous cardiovascular disease (CVD), including coronary heart disease and stroke.
output: Doctors want to find out if taking a certain type of medicine can help people who have already had heart or stroke problems to avoid getting sick again. They want to make sure the medicine is both safe and effective.
gold: El objetivo de este estudio fue evaluar el efecto de los fibratos para la prevención de eventos graves que incluyen los ataques cardíacos, los accidentes cerebrovasculares y la muerte debido a enfermedades circulatorias en los pacientes con enfermedades circulatorias existentes.
translated_output: Los médicos quieren saber si tomar cierto tipo de medicamento puede ayudar a las personas que ya han tenido problemas cardíacos o derrames cerebrales a evitar volver a enfermarse. Quieren asegurarse de que el medicamento sea seguro y eficaz.
old_gold: The aim of this study was to assess the effect of fibrates for the prevention of major events including heart attacks, strokes, and circulatory disease death in people with existing circulatory disease.

input: Statins had uncertain effects on progression of CKD.
output: Statins are medicines that doctors use to try to slow down the worsening of a disease called Chronic Kidney Disease, but it's not known if they work.
gold: Aunque la administración de estatinas no redujo claramente los riesgos de progresión de la nefropatía, pueden recomendarse para reducir los riesgos de muerte y eventos cardíacos en pacientes con nefropatía en estadio inicial.
translated_output: Las estatinas son medicamentos que usan los médicos para tratar de retrasar el empeoramiento de una enfermedad llamada enfermedad renal crónica, pero no se sabe si funcionan.
old_gold: Although use of statins did not clearly reduce risks of kidney disease progression, they can be recommended to reduce risks of death and heart-related events in people with early stages of kidney disease.

input: We searched the Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials (CENTRAL; 2014, Issue 6) in The Cochrane Library, MEDLINE via Ovid SP (1966 to June 2014) and Embase via Ovid SP (1980 to June 2014).
output: We looked for studies about a certain topic in two online libraries. We looked at the Cochrane Library from 2014, and in the MEDLINE library from 1966 to 2014, and in the Embase library from 1980 to 2014.
gold: La evidencia está actualizada hasta junio de 2014.
translated_output: Buscamos estudios sobre un tema determinado en dos bibliotecas en línea. Observamos la Biblioteca Cochrane desde 2014, y en la biblioteca MEDLINE desde 1966 hasta 2014, y en la biblioteca Embase desde 1980 hasta 2014.
old_gold: The evidence is current to June 2014.

input: Where results were reported for individual participants in 17 studies, 'no worse than mild pain' was achieved by 96% of participants (362/377), and an outcome equivalent to treatment success in 63% (400/638).
output: Out of the 17 studies that looked at the results for each person, 96% (362 out of 377) said that the pain they experienced was no more than mild, and 63% (400 out of 638) said that the treatment was successful.
gold: Más de seis de cada diez participantes estuvieron muy satisfechos con el tratamiento con morfina, o consideraron que el resultado fue muy bueno o excelente.
translated_output: De los 17 estudios que analizaron los resultados de cada persona, el 96 % (362 de 377) dijeron que el dolor que experimentaron no fue más que leve, y el 63 % (400 de 638) dijeron que el tratamiento fue exitoso.
old_gold: More than 6 in 10 participants were very satisfied with the morphine treatment, or considered the result to be very good or excellent.

input: We searched the Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials (CENTRAL) (the Cochrane Library, 2016, Issue 9), Ovid MEDLINE (1950 to September 2016), Ovid Embase (1974 to September 2016), Science Citation Index Expanded (1970 to September 2016), Chinese Biomedical Literature Database (CBM) (1978 to September 2016), ClinicalTrials.gov (September 2016), and World Health Organization International Clinical Trials Registry Platform (September 2016).
output: We looked for information about research studies that had been done before September 2016. We looked in different places like the Cochrane Library, MEDLINE, Embase, the Science Citation Index, the Chinese Biomedical Literature Database, ClinicalTrials.gov, and the World Health Organization International Clinical Trials Registry Platform.
gold: Los estudios se realizaron en los EE.UU., Australia, China, Finlandia y Países Bajos.
translated_output: Buscamos información sobre estudios de investigación que se habían realizado antes de septiembre de 2016. Buscamos en diferentes lugares como la Biblioteca Cochrane, MEDLINE, Embase, Science Citation Index, Chinese Biomedical Literature Database, ClinicalTrials.gov y la Organización Mundial de la Salud Internacional. Plataforma de Registro de Ensayos Clínicos.
old_gold: Studies were conducted in the USA, Australia, China, Finland, and Netherlands.

input: Based on the available evidence, physical disruption of a fibrin sheath using interventional radiology techniques appears to be equally efficacious as the use of a pharmaceutical thrombolytic agent for the immediate management of dysfunctional catheters (57 participants: RR 0.92, 95% CI 0.80 to 1.07).
output: Using a special medical technique (interventional radiology) to break apart a fibrin sheath seems to work just as well as using medicine (a thrombolytic agent) to help fix catheters that are not working properly. 57 people were studied and the results showed that the two methods were equally effective.
gold: La alteración física de una vaina de fibrina puede tener la misma efectividad que el agente trombolítico farmacéutico para el tratamiento inmediato de la disfunción del catéter.
translated_output: El uso de una técnica médica especial (radiología intervencionista) para romper una vaina de fibrina parece funcionar tan bien como el uso de medicamentos (un agente trombolítico) para ayudar a reparar los catéteres que no funcionan correctamente. Se estudiaron 57 personas y los resultados mostraron que los dos métodos eran igualmente efectivos.
old_gold: Physical disruption of a fibrin sheath may be equally effective as pharmaceutical thrombolytic agent for immediate management of catheter dysfunction.

input: Most studies had a high risk of bias due to poor study design, broad inclusion criteria, low patient numbers and industry involvement.
output: Many studies did not have reliable results because they used bad methods, allowed too many people to join the study, had too few people taking part, and were sponsored by companies.
gold: La calidad de la evidencia es limitada por el tamaño de estudio pequeño y el alto riesgo de sesgo.
translated_output: Muchos estudios no tuvieron resultados confiables porque utilizaron métodos inadecuados, permitieron que demasiadas personas se unieran al estudio, participaron muy pocas personas y fueron patrocinados por empresas.
old_gold: The quality of evidence is limited by small study size and high risk of bias.

input: Available treatments for melasma are unsatisfactory.
output: There are not very good treatments that can help people with melasma.
gold: El melasma epidérmico es el más superficial con un aumento del pigmento de la piel (melanina) en la capa superior de la piel (epidermis).
translated_output: No existen tratamientos muy buenos que puedan ayudar a las personas con melasma.
old_gold: Epidermal melasma is the most superficial with an increase in the skin pigment (melanin) in the top layer of skin (epidermis).

input: Pooled analyses for adverse events suggest lower risk of nausea and vomiting with propofol than with sevoflurane (risk ratio (RR) 0.68, 95% CI 0.51 to 0.91, low-quality evidence) or isoflurane (RR 0.45, 95% CI 0.26 to 0.78) and greater risk of haemodynamic changes with propofol than with sevoflurane (RR 1.85, 95% CI 1.07 to 3.17), but no differences in the risk of shivering or pain.
output: The results from studies comparing propofol, sevoflurane and isoflurane show that propofol is less likely to cause nausea and vomiting than sevoflurane and isoflurane, but more likely to cause changes in the body's blood pressure than sevoflurane. There is no difference in the risk of shivering or pain between these drugs.
gold: Aunque el isoflurano se asoció con un despertar más lento (alrededor de tres minutos y medio) en comparación con el propofol, los investigadores no encontraron diferencias importante entre el propofol y el sevoflurano.
translated_output: Los resultados de los estudios que compararon propofol, sevoflurano e isoflurano muestran que es menos probable que propofol provoque náuseas y vómitos que sevoflurano e isoflurano, pero más probable que provoque cambios en la presión arterial del cuerpo que sevoflurano. No hay diferencia en el riesgo de escalofríos o dolor entre estos medicamentos.
old_gold: Although isoflurane was associated with slower awakening (about three and a half minutes) compared with propofol, researchers found no important differences between propofol and sevoflurane.

input: Randomised controlled trials that evaluated topical and systemic interventions for melasma.
output: Randomised controlled trials are experiments that studied different treatments for melasma, which is a type of skin discoloration. The treatments studied were both ones you put on your skin and ones you take as medicine.
gold: En la actualidad no se dispone de información adecuada para determinar el mejor tratamiento para el melasma.
translated_output: Los ensayos controlados aleatorios son experimentos que estudiaron diferentes tratamientos para el melasma, que es un tipo de decoloración de la piel. Los tratamientos estudiados fueron tanto los que se aplican sobre la piel como los que se toman como medicamento.
old_gold: There is inadequate information available at present to determine the best treatment for melasma.

input: The review contains only one trial with a total of 212 participants, all with spinal cord injury and open pressure ulcers classed as stage III and IV.
output: This sentence means that there was one study done with 212 people who all had spinal cord injuries and wounds that were very deep and serious.
gold: Sólo se encontró un ensayo con un total de 212 participantes.
translated_output: Esta oración significa que hubo un estudio realizado con 212 personas que tenían lesiones en la médula espinal y heridas que eran muy profundas y graves.
old_gold: We found only one trial involving a total of 212 participants.

input: To assess the effects of specific individual psychological therapies for anorexia nervosa in adults or older adolescents treated in an outpatient setting.
output: This sentence is talking about studying what happens when adults or teenagers with anorexia get psychological therapy from a doctor outside of a hospital.
gold: ¿Quién estará interesado en esta revisión? Esta revisión será de interés para los pacientes con experiencia vivida de anorexia nerviosa y para las personas involucradas en su cuidado. ¿Qué estudios se incluyeron en la revisión?
translated_output: Esta oración habla de estudiar lo que sucede cuando los adultos o adolescentes con anorexia reciben terapia psicológica de un médico fuera del hospital.
old_gold: This review will be of interest to people with lived experience of anorexia nervosa and people involved in their care.

input: This review contains a total of 62 included studies, with 4241 participants.
output: This sentence means that there were 62 different studies about a particular topic, and that 4241 people took part in those studies.
gold: Se encontraron 62 estudios con 4241 participantes.
translated_output: Esta oración significa que hubo 62 estudios diferentes sobre un tema en particular, y que 4241 personas participaron en esos estudios.
old_gold: We found 62 studies with 4241 participants.

input: Methodologically rigorous trials are needed to investigate interventions aimed at preventing the uptake of tobacco use amongst Indigenous youth and to assist in bridging the gap between tobacco-related health disparities in Indigenous and non-Indigenous populations.
output: We need to do a careful study to find out if there is a way to stop Indigenous youth from using tobacco, and to reduce the differences in health between Indigenous people and other people when it comes to tobacco.
gold: Esta revisión halló que no existe investigación publicada que evalúe los programas orientados a evitar que los jóvenes indígenas no consuman tabaco. La información de dos estudios incluidos en esta revisión (1505 participantes en total, en comunidades de nativos americanos) no permite realizar una conclusión sobre si los programas de prevención del consumo de tabaco en las poblaciones indígenas evitan que los jóvenes consuman tabaco con o sin humo.
translated_output: Necesitamos hacer un estudio cuidadoso para averiguar si hay una manera de evitar que los jóvenes indígenas usen tabaco y reducir las diferencias en la salud entre los pueblos indígenas y otras personas en lo que respecta al tabaco.
old_gold: This review found that there is not enough published research evaluating programmes aiming to prevent Indigenous youth from starting to use tobacco.

input: The focus of treatment has moved to an outpatient setting, and a number of differing psychological therapies are presently used in treatment.
output: The way doctors help people with problems has changed. Instead of staying in a hospital, people go to a place outside the hospital for help. Doctors use different ways to help them, like talking about their problems.
gold: Esta revisión intentó evaluar las evidencia acerca de los efectos del tratamiento psicológico individual (tratamiento proporcionado a un pacientes en lugar de a un grupo) administrado en contextos ambulatorios a adolescentes mayores y adultos con anorexia nerviosa.
translated_output: La forma en que los médicos ayudan a las personas con problemas ha cambiado. En lugar de quedarse en un hospital, las personas van a un lugar fuera del hospital en busca de ayuda. Los médicos usan diferentes formas de ayudarlos, como hablar sobre sus problemas.
old_gold: This review aimed to assess evidence about the effects of individual psychological therapy (therapy provided to one person as opposed to a group) delivered in outpatient settings to older adolescents and adults with anorexia nervosa.

input: Several are under development, but only one (MSP/RESA, also known as Combination B) has been tested in randomized controlled trials.
output: Several different kinds of solutions are being developed, but only one of them (called MSP/RESA, or Combination B) has been tested to make sure it works.
gold: Una vacuna para esta fase, MSP/RESA (también conocida como Combinación B), ha sido probada en pruebas de campo en Papua Nueva Guinea.
translated_output: Se están desarrollando varios tipos diferentes de soluciones, pero solo una de ellas (llamada MSP/RESA o Combinación B) se ha probado para asegurarse de que funciona.
old_gold: One vaccine for this phase, MSP/RESA (also known as Combination B), has been tested in field trials in Papua New Guinea.

input: Statin-related effects on stroke and kidney function were found to be uncertain and adverse effects of treatment are incompletely understood.
output: Researchers studied how taking a type of medicine called statins affects stroke and kidney function, but they weren't sure what the effects were. They also don't fully understand what side effects taking statins might have.
gold: Sin embargo, los posibles efectos secundarios son inciertos y requieren mayor estudio.
translated_output: Los investigadores estudiaron cómo la ingesta de un tipo de medicamento llamado estatinas afecta el accidente cerebrovascular y la función renal, pero no estaban seguros de cuáles eran los efectos. Tampoco entienden completamente qué efectos secundarios podría tener tomar estatinas.
old_gold: However, the potential side-effects are uncertain, and need further study.

input: Indigenous youth in particular commence smoking at an early age, and a disproportionate burden of substance-related morbidity and mortality exists as a result.
output: Young people who are from the original or earliest known inhabitants of an area, often start smoking earlier than other people, and this leads to more health problems and death than what is normal.
gold: Los daños asociados a la salud son inadmisibles.
translated_output: Los jóvenes que son de los habitantes originales o más antiguos conocidos de un área, a menudo comienzan a fumar antes que otras personas, y esto conduce a más problemas de salud y muerte de lo normal.
old_gold: The associated harms to health are unacceptable.

input: We found four small studies that met the inclusion criteria.
output: We looked for research studies that met certain requirements, and we found four of them that were small.
gold: Se encontraron cuatro estudios pequeños después de una extensa búsqueda en la literatura.
translated_output: Buscamos estudios de investigación que cumplieran con ciertos requisitos y encontramos cuatro de ellos que eran pequeños.
old_gold: We found four small studies were identified after an extensive literature search.

input: Although carbon dioxide meets most of the requirements for pneumoperitoneum, the absorption of carbon dioxide may be associated with adverse events.
output: Carbon dioxide is a good choice for a medical procedure involving gases inside the stomach, but using it could cause some bad side effects.
gold: Sin embargo, el uso de dióxido de carbono puede causar complicaciones cardíacas o pulmonares.
translated_output: El dióxido de carbono es una buena opción para un procedimiento médico que involucre gases dentro del estómago, pero usarlo podría causar algunos efectos secundarios negativos.
old_gold: However, use of carbon dioxide may cause heart or lung complications.

input: We included all randomised clinical trials comparing box model trainers versus no training in surgical trainees with no prior laparoscopic experience.
output: We looked at all studies that compared people who were taught how to do surgery with a box model trainer to people who were not taught anything at all. All of the people studied were learning to do laparoscopic surgery for the first time.
gold: Se procuró determinar si el entrenamiento con simulador es útil en dichos médicos practicantes en cuanto a la mejoría de los resultados técnicos mediante una búsqueda minuciosa de la bibliografía médica para obtener ensayos clínicos aleatorios.
translated_output: Examinamos todos los estudios que compararon a las personas a las que se les enseñó cómo realizar una cirugía con un entrenador de modelo de caja con las personas a las que no se les enseñó nada en absoluto. Todas las personas estudiadas estaban aprendiendo a hacer cirugía laparoscópica por primera vez.
old_gold: We sought to determine whether the box model training is useful in such trainees in terms of improving technical outcomes by performing a thorough search of the medical literature for randomised clinical trials.

input: Moderate evidence showed that the fibrate class can be effective in the secondary prevention of composite outcome of non-fatal stroke, non-fatal MI, and vascular death.
output: Studies showed that taking a type of medicine called "fibrate" can help to prevent strokes, heart attacks, and death caused by blood vessels.
gold: En combinación con los datos del clofibrato, la calidad de la evidencia fue moderada para el resultado compuesto (accidente cerebrovascular no mortal, infarto de miocardio [IM] no mortal y muerte por causa vascular) y el resultado IM (no mortal o mortal) y baja para el accidente cerebrovascular (isquémico o hemorrágico, no mortal o mortal) y la muerte por causa vascular o por cualquier causa durante el tratamiento y el período de seguimiento programado.
translated_output: Los estudios demostraron que tomar un tipo de medicamento llamado "fibrato" puede ayudar a prevenir derrames cerebrales, ataques cardíacos y la muerte causada por los vasos sanguíneos.
old_gold: In combination with clofibrate data, quality of evidence was moderate for the composite (non-fatal stroke, non-fatal myocardial infarction (MI), and vascular death) and MI (non-fatal or fatal) outcomes and low for stroke (ischaemic or haemorrhagic, non-fatal or fatal) and death from vascular or any cause during the treatment and scheduled follow-up period.

input: Triple-combination cream was significantly more effective at lightening melasma than hydroquinone alone (RR 1.58, 95% CI 1.26 to 1.97) or when compared to the dual combinations of tretinoin and hydroquinone (RR 2.75, 95% CI 1.59 to 4.74), tretinoin and fluocinolone acetonide (RR 14.00, 95% CI 4.43 to 44.25), or hydroquinone and fluocinolone acetonide (RR 10.50, 95% CI 3.85 to 28.60).
output: Triple-combination cream was much better at lightening melasma compared to using hydroquinone alone. It was even more effective than using two different creams together, like tretinoin and hydroquinone, tretinoin and fluocinolone acetonide, or hydroquinone and fluocinolone acetonide.
gold: La crema de combinación triple fue significativamente más eficaz para aclarar el melasma comparada con la hidroquinona sola o con las combinaciones duales como la tretinoina y la hidroquinona, la tretinoina y el acetónido de fluocinolona, o la hidroquinona y el acetónido de fluocinolona.
translated_output: La crema de combinación triple fue mucho mejor para aclarar el melasma en comparación con el uso de hidroquinona sola. Fue incluso más efectivo que usar dos cremas diferentes juntas, como tretinoína e hidroquinona, tretinoína y acetónido de fluocinolona, o hidroquinona y acetónido de fluocinolona.
old_gold: Triple-combination cream was significantly more effective at lightening melasma when compared to hydroquinone alone or to dual combinations such as tretinoin and hydroquinone, tretinoin and fluocinolone acetonide, or hydroquinone and fluocinolone acetonide.

input: Anabolic steroids are considered because of their ability to stimulate protein synthesis and build muscle mass.
output: Anabolic steroids are used by some people because they are believed to help build muscles and increase the amount of protein in the body.
gold: Se piensa que promueven el crecimiento del músculo esquelético y restauran la masa muscular, lo que podría ayudar en la cicatrización de las úlceras por presión.
translated_output: Algunas personas usan esteroides anabólicos porque se cree que ayudan a desarrollar los músculos y aumentan la cantidad de proteína en el cuerpo.
old_gold: They are thought to promote the growth of skeletal muscle and to restore muscle mass, which could help pressure ulcers to heal.

input: We searched until January 2016.
output: We looked for something until the end of January 2016.
gold: La evidencia está actualizada hasta enero 2016.
translated_output: Buscamos algo hasta finales de enero de 2016.
old_gold: The evidence is current to January 2016.

input: Remote ischaemic conditioning (RIC) has been developed as a neuroprotective strategy to prevent and treat ischaemic stroke.
output: Remote Ischemic Conditioning is a way to help protect your brain from stroke. It helps to prevent stroke and can also help treat it if you already have one.
gold: El condicionamiento isquémico remoto (CIR) es una estrategia para proteger y prevenir el daño al tejido cerebral al mejorar su capacidad de tolerar la reducción del flujo sanguíneo.
translated_output: El condicionamiento isquémico remoto es una forma de ayudar a proteger su cerebro de un accidente cerebrovascular. Ayuda a prevenir un accidente cerebrovascular y también puede ayudar a tratarlo si ya tiene uno.
old_gold: Remote ischaemic conditioning (RIC) is a strategy to protect and prevent damage to brain tissue by improving its ability to tolerate reduced blood flow.

input: Statins consistently lower death and major cardiovascular events by 20% in people with CKD not requiring dialysis.
output: Statins are a type of medicine that help people with a kidney problem called CKD, who don't need dialysis, to be 20% less likely to die or have serious problems with their heart.
gold: También se encontró que el tratamiento con estatinas fue efectivo para reducir las enfermedades cardíacas y la muerte en pacientes con NC, pero que no presentan cardiopatía.
translated_output: Las estatinas son un tipo de medicamento que ayuda a las personas con un problema renal llamado CKD, que no necesitan diálisis, a tener un 20 % menos de probabilidades de morir o de tener problemas cardíacos graves.
old_gold: Statin treatment was also found to be effective in reducing cardiac disease and death in people who have CKD but not heart disease.

input: There was no significant difference in the time taken to complete the task in the remaining three comparisons (reverse alignment versus forward alignment box training; box trainer suturing versus box trainer drills; and single incision versus multiport box model training).
output: The time it took to complete the task was the same in the three remaining comparisons. These comparisons were between using the reverse alignment and forward alignment box training, box trainer suturing and box trainer drills, and single incision and multiport box model training.
gold: No parece haber diferencias significativas en los diferentes métodos de entrenamiento con simulador.
translated_output: El tiempo que se tardó en completar la tarea fue el mismo en las tres comparaciones restantes. Estas comparaciones fueron entre el uso del entrenamiento de caja de alineación inversa y de alineación hacia adelante, la sutura del entrenador de caja y los taladros del entrenador de caja, y el entrenamiento del modelo de caja multipuerto y de incisión única.
old_gold: There does not appear to be any significant differences in different methods of box model training.

input: We located 10 RCTs involving 2961 participating surgeons performing an operation in which the use of blunt needles was compared to the use of sharp needles.
output: This sentence is talking about a study that looked at 10 different groups of doctors who all did the same kind of surgery. In the study, they compared two different types of needles that the doctors used. One type of needle was "blunt" and the other type was "sharp". In total, 2961 doctors took part in the study.
gold: Se localizaron diez ECA con 2961 cirugías en las que las agujas con punta roma se compararon con las agujas afiladas.
translated_output: Esta oración se refiere a un estudio que analizó a 10 grupos diferentes de médicos que realizaron el mismo tipo de cirugía. En el estudio, compararon dos tipos diferentes de agujas que usaron los médicos. Un tipo de aguja era "romo" y el otro tipo era "afilado". En total, 2961 médicos participaron en el estudio.
old_gold: We located 10 RCTs with 2961 operations in which blunt needles were compared to sharp needles.

input: None of these trials assessed or reported data regarding other outcomes, and information was insufficient to show whether a specific antibiotic is better than another.
output: This sentence means that none of the experiments done tested or shared information about other things, and there wasn't enough information to tell if one type of antibiotic is better than another.
gold: Los estudios no midieron ninguno de los otros efectos de interés para los médicos o los pacientes, y la información fue insuficiente para indicar si algún antibiótico individual es mejor que otro.
translated_output: Esta oración significa que ninguno de los experimentos realizados probó o compartió información sobre otras cosas, y no hubo suficiente información para saber si un tipo de antibiótico es mejor que otro.
old_gold: None of the other effects of interest to clinicians or patients were measured in the studies, and information was insufficient to show whether any single antibiotic is better than any other.

input: A malaria vaccine is needed because of the heavy burden of mortality and morbidity due to this disease.
output: A malaria vaccine is necessary because many people are dying and getting very sick from this illness.
gold: Las vacunas son ampliamente consideradas un componente necesario para el éxito completo del control de la malaria.
translated_output: Es necesaria una vacuna contra la malaria porque muchas personas están muriendo y enfermando gravemente a causa de esta enfermedad.
old_gold: Vaccines are widely considered a necessary component for the complete success of malaria control.

input: It was not clear if these trials were sufficiently powered to detect any clinical differences between formulations or comparator drugs.
output: The researchers were not sure if they had enough information to figure out if the different medicines and treatments were different from each other or not.
gold: lo cual dificultó la posibilidad de determinar si algún comprimido o preparado oral con morfina fue mejor que otro.
translated_output: Los investigadores no estaban seguros de si tenían suficiente información para determinar si los diferentes medicamentos y tratamientos eran diferentes entre sí o no.
old_gold: This made it difficult to work out whether any one tablet or preparation of oral morphine was better than any other.

input: We also contacted investigators involved with the identified trials for other published or unpublished trials.
output: We asked people who work on the trials we know about to tell us about any other trials that have been written about or not written about yet.
gold: También se escribió a los investigadores para buscar más ensayos.
translated_output: Les pedimos a las personas que trabajan en los ensayos que conocemos que nos informen sobre cualquier otro ensayo sobre el que se haya escrito o sobre el que aún no se haya escrito.
old_gold: We also wrote to researchers to look for more trials.

input: The rates were 24.5 for the sponge and 10.9 for the diaphragm in the UK trial.
output: In the UK trial, it cost 24.5 pounds to buy a sponge and 10.9 pounds to buy a diaphragm.
gold: Un ensayo realizado en el Reino Unido obtuvo resultados similares.
translated_output: En la prueba del Reino Unido, costó 24,5 libras comprar una esponja y 10,9 libras comprar un diafragma.
old_gold: A U.K. trial found similar results.

input: Studies are old, often small, and were largely carried out for registration purposes and therefore were only designed to show equivalence between different formulations.
output: Studies that were done a long time ago were usually not very big, and their main purpose was to make sure that different versions of something were the same.
gold: Los estudios a menudo fueron pequeños, compararon muchos preparados diferentes y usaron diferentes diseños de estudio.
translated_output: Los estudios que se hicieron hace mucho tiempo no solían ser muy grandes y su objetivo principal era asegurarse de que las diferentes versiones de algo fueran lo mismo.
old_gold: The studies were often small, compared many different preparations, and used different study designs.

input: To assess the benefits and harms of RIC for preventing ischaemic stroke and for treating people with ischaemic stroke and those at risk for ischaemic stroke.
output: This sentence is asking us to find out if a certain type of medical treatment (RIC) is helpful in preventing and treating strokes. We want to know if the benefits of using RIC are greater than the risks.
gold: ¿Cuáles son los efectos beneficiosos del uso del condicionamiento isquémico remoto (una fisioterapia no invasiva que incluye inflar manguitos de presión arterial para reducir el flujo sanguíneo en los brazos y las piernas y luego liberar la sangre afectada hacia todo el cuerpo) en los pacientes con accidente cerebrovascular o en los que tienen riesgo de accidente cerebrovascular causado por la reducción del flujo sanguíneo?
translated_output: Esta oración nos pide que averigüemos si cierto tipo de tratamiento médico (RIC, por sus siglas en inglés) es útil para prevenir y tratar los accidentes cerebrovasculares. Queremos saber si los beneficios de usar RIC son mayores que los riesgos.
old_gold: What are the benefits of using remote ischaemic conditioning (a noninvasive physical therapy that involves inflating blood pressure cuffs to reduce blood flow in arms and legs, and then releasing the affected blood around the body) in people with stroke or those at risk of stroke caused by low blood flow?

input: In four studies, the use of blunt needles reduced the number of self-reported needle stick injuries with a RR of 0.31 (95% CI 0.14 to 0.68).
output: In four different studies, it was found that using blunt needles instead of sharp needles reduced the number of people who got hurt by needle sticks by a lot. The number of people who got hurt by needle sticks was 31% less than before.
gold: En cuatro estudios, el uso de agujas con punta roma también redujo el número de lesiones por pinchazo de aguja autoinformadas en un 69% (intervalo de confianza del 95%: 14% a 68%).
translated_output: En cuatro estudios diferentes, se encontró que el uso de agujas desafiladas en lugar de agujas afiladas redujo mucho la cantidad de personas que se lastimaron con pinchazos de agujas. La cantidad de personas que resultaron heridas por pinchazos de agujas fue un 31 % menor que antes.
old_gold: In four studies the use of blunt needles also reduced the number of self-reported needle stick injuries by 69% (95% confidence interval 14% to 68%).

input: Fibrates are a class of drugs characterised by mainly lowering high triglyceride, raising high-density lipoprotein (HDL) cholesterol, and lowering the small dense fraction of low-density lipoprotein (LDL) cholesterol.
output: Fibrates are a type of medicine that can help lower levels of unhealthy fats in your blood. They can make the good fats go up and the bad fats go down. This can help keep your heart healthy.
gold: El ajuste exitoso de las grasas sanguíneas en los pacientes con enfermedades del sistema circulatorio podría hacer que los pacientes tengan menos probabilidades de presentar ataques cardíacos, accidentes cerebrovasculares y morir debido a su enfermedad circulatoria.
translated_output: Los fibratos son un tipo de medicamento que puede ayudar a reducir los niveles de grasas no saludables en la sangre. Pueden hacer que las grasas buenas suban y las grasas malas bajen. Esto puede ayudar a mantener su corazón saludable.
old_gold: Successful adjustment of the blood fats in people with disease of their circulatory system could mean these individuals are less likely to have heart attacks, stroke, and die from their circulatory disease.

input: Thrombolysis, fibrin sheath disruption and over-the-wire catheter exchange are effective and appropriate therapies for immediately restoring catheter patency in dysfunctional cuffed and tunnelled HD catheters.
output: Thrombolysis, fibrin sheath disruption, and exchanging a catheter over a wire are good ways to quickly fix a catheter that isn't working properly in a person who has a cuffed and tunneled (covered) catheter in their body.
gold: El tratamiento trombolítico probablemente fue mejor que el placebo para restaurar la función del catéter aunque no hubo una dosis ni un método de administración óptimos.
translated_output: La trombólisis, la interrupción de la vaina de fibrina y el cambio de un catéter por un alambre son buenas formas de reparar rápidamente un catéter que no funciona correctamente en una persona que tiene un catéter con manguito y tunelizado (cubierto) en el cuerpo.
old_gold: Thrombolytic therapy was probably better than placebo at restoring catheter function but there was no optimal dose or administration method.

input: Hydrocoeles are common cystic scrotal abnormalities, described as a fluid-filled collection between the visceral and parietal layers of the tunica vaginalis of the scrotum.
output: Hydrocoeles are bumps that can form on the scrotum, the sac of skin that holds a boy's testicles. They are filled with a special liquid and can feel like a bag of water.
gold: El hidrocele es una anomalía quística escrotal común, descrita como una colección llena de líquido alrededor de los testículos.
translated_output: Los hidroceles son protuberancias que se pueden formar en el escroto, el saco de piel que contiene los testículos de un niño. Están llenos de un líquido especial y pueden sentirse como una bolsa de agua.
old_gold: Hydrocoeles are common cystic scrotal abnormalities, described as a fluid-filled collection around the testicles.

input: They can be grouped into those including a bleaching agent such as hydroquinone, triple-combination creams (hydroquinone, tretinoin, and fluocinolone acetonide), and combination therapies (hydroquinone cream and glycolic acid peels), as well as less conventional therapies including rucinol, vitamin C iontophoresis, and skin-lightening complexes like Thiospot and Gigawhite.
output: There are different types of treatments that can be used to lighten skin. Some of them include using a bleaching cream with hydroquinone, using a combination of three different creams (hydroquinone, tretinoin, and fluocinolone acetonide), using a cream with hydroquinone and having a type of acid peel, and using other creams that have special ingredients like rucinol, vitamin C, and something called Thiospot and Gigawhite.
gold: ácido azelaico), retinoides tópicos (p.ej.
translated_output: Hay diferentes tipos de tratamientos que se pueden utilizar para aclarar la piel. Algunas de ellas incluyen usar una crema decolorante con hidroquinona, usar una combinación de tres cremas diferentes (hidroquinona, tretinoína y acetónido de fluocinolona), usar una crema con hidroquinona y que tiene un tipo de exfoliación ácida, y usar otras cremas que tienen ingredientes especiales como rucinol, vitamina C y algo llamado Thiospot y Gigawhite.
old_gold: azelaic acid), topical retinoids (e.g.

input: Randomised controlled trials of tai chi lasting at least three months involving healthy adults or adults at high risk of CVD.
output: This sentence is about a study that is testing how tai chi affects adults who are either healthy or at risk for a type of heart disease. The study will last for at least three months and it will involve randomly selecting some people to do tai chi and others to not do tai chi.
gold: Hubo variaciones en la duración y el estilo del tai chi y el seguimiento de las intervenciones varió de tres a 12 meses.
translated_output: Esta oración se trata de un estudio que está probando cómo el tai chi afecta a los adultos sanos o en riesgo de sufrir un tipo de enfermedad cardíaca. El estudio tendrá una duración de al menos tres meses y consistirá en seleccionar aleatoriamente a algunas personas para hacer tai chi y otras para no hacerlo.
old_gold: There were variations in the duration and style of tai chi and the follow-up of the interventions ranged from three to 12 months.

input: It is most common in young adult women, in whom the incidence may be increasing.
output: This sentence means that something is happening more often in young adult women, and it may be happening even more often now than before.
gold: Aproximadamente uno de cada diez pacientes con anorexia nerviosa es hombre.
translated_output: Esta oración significa que algo está sucediendo con más frecuencia en mujeres adultas jóvenes, y puede estar sucediendo incluso con más frecuencia ahora que antes.
old_gold: About one in 10 people with anorexia nervosa is male.

input: The safety of nitrous oxide, helium, and room air pneumoperitoneum has yet to be established.
output: The safety of using gases like nitrous oxide, helium, and air to fill up a person's stomach with air to help doctors look inside has not been proven yet.
gold: Debido a los pocos participantes incluidos en la revisión, se desconoce la seguridad del uso de óxido nitroso, helio o el aire ambiental.
translated_output: Aún no se ha demostrado la seguridad de usar gases como el óxido nitroso, el helio y el aire para llenar el estómago de una persona con aire para ayudar a los médicos a examinar el interior.
old_gold: Because of the few participants included in the review, the safety of using nitrous oxide, helium, or room air is unknown.

input: There were no significant differences in the error score between the two groups in any of the comparisons (box trainer suturing versus box trainer drills; single incision versus multiport box model training; Z-maze box training versus U-maze box training).
output: The results of all the experiments comparing the different types of box training (using sutures, using drills, using a single incision, using multiple ports, and using a Z-maze or a U-maze) were the same. There were no big differences in the number of mistakes made by either group.
gold: No parece haber diferencias significativas en los diferentes métodos de entrenamiento con simulador.
translated_output: Los resultados de todos los experimentos que compararon los diferentes tipos de entrenamiento en caja (usando suturas, usando taladros, usando una sola incisión, usando múltiples puertos y usando un laberinto en Z o un laberinto en U) fueron los mismos. No hubo grandes diferencias en el número de errores cometidos por cada grupo.
old_gold: There does not appear to be any significant differences in different methods of box model training.

input: Surgical training has traditionally been one of apprenticeship, where the surgical trainee learns to perform surgery under the supervision of a trained surgeon.
output: Traditionally, surgeons have learned how to do surgery by watching and working with an experienced surgeon. The experienced surgeon teaches the trainee all the skills needed to do surgery.
gold: Tradicionalmente, el entrenamiento quirúrgico ha sido de aprendizaje, donde el cirujano practicante aprende a realizar la cirugía bajo la supervisión de un cirujano entrenado.
translated_output: Tradicionalmente, los cirujanos han aprendido a hacer cirugía observando y trabajando con un cirujano experimentado. El cirujano experimentado le enseña al aprendiz todas las habilidades necesarias para realizar la cirugía.
old_gold: Surgical training has traditionally been one of apprenticeship, where the surgical trainee learns to perform the surgery under the supervision of a trained surgeon.

input: We included nine RCTs, randomising 519 participants, comparing different gases for establishing pneumoperitoneum: nitrous oxide (three trials), helium (five trials), or room air (one trial) was compared to carbon dioxide.
output: We did 9 experiments to see which gas was the best to help make a space in the stomach. We tested 519 people with 3 different gases: nitrous oxide, helium, and room air. We compared them to carbon dioxide to see which one worked best.
gold: Se identificaron nueve ensayos clínicos con 519 participantes, de los cuales tres ensayos (196 participantes) compararon el óxido nitroso (gas de la risa) con el dióxido de carbono, cinco ensayos (177 participantes) compararon el helio con el dióxido de carbono y un ensayo (146 participantes) comparó el aire ambiental con el dióxido de carbono.
translated_output: Hicimos 9 experimentos para ver qué gas era el mejor para ayudar a hacer un espacio en el estómago. Probamos a 519 personas con 3 gases diferentes: óxido nitroso, helio y aire ambiente. Los comparamos con el dióxido de carbono para ver cuál funcionaba mejor.
old_gold: We identified nine clinical trials with 519 participants, of which three trials (196 participants) compared nitrous oxide (laughing gas) with carbon dioxide, five trials (177 participants) compared helium with carbon dioxide, and one trial (146 participants) compared room air with carbon dioxide.

input: The meta-analysis (including all fibrate trials) showed evidence for a protective effect of fibrates primarily compared to placebo for the primary composite outcome of non-fatal stroke, non-fatal myocardial infarction (MI), and vascular death (risk ratio (RR) 0.88, 95% confidence interval (CI) 0.83 to 0.94; participants = 16,064; studies = 12; I2 = 45%, fixed effect).
output: This study found that taking fibrates (medicine) may help protect against having a stroke, a heart attack, or dying from a heart or vascular problem. The study included 16,064 people and 12 different research studies. The results showed that people who took fibrates had a 12% lower chance of having a stroke, heart attack, or dying from a heart or vascular problem compared to people who didn't take the medicine.
gold: El análisis de esta revisión mostró que cuando se compararon principalmente con placebo, los fibratos pueden ser efectivos para la prevención del resultado compuesto accidente cerebrovascular no mortal, ataque cardíaco (infarto de miocardio) no mortal y muerte debido a enfermedades circulatorias.
translated_output: Este estudio encontró que tomar fibratos (medicamento) puede ayudar a proteger contra un accidente cerebrovascular, un ataque cardíaco o morir a causa de un problema cardíaco o vascular. El estudio incluyó a 16,064 personas y 12 estudios de investigación diferentes. Los resultados mostraron que las personas que tomaron fibratos tenían un 12 % menos de probabilidades de sufrir un derrame cerebral, un ataque cardíaco o morir a causa de un problema cardíaco o vascular en comparación con las personas que no tomaron el medicamento.
old_gold: Our analysis showed that when compared primarily to placebo, fibrates can be effective for prevention of composite outcome of non-fatal stroke, non-fatal heart attack (myocardial infarction), and death due to circulatory disease.

input: To compare the benefits and harms of box model training versus no training, another box model, animal model, or cadaveric model training for surgical trainees with no prior laparoscopic experience.
output: This sentence is talking about different ways to train people to do surgery. It is comparing the good and bad things about using a model of a box to train people, compared to not using any model at all, or using models of animals, or models of dead bodies. It is specifically about people who have never done surgery before.
gold: Se procuró determinar si el entrenamiento con simulador es útil en dichos médicos practicantes en cuanto a la mejoría de los resultados técnicos mediante una búsqueda minuciosa de la bibliografía médica para obtener ensayos clínicos aleatorios.
translated_output: Esta oración habla de diferentes formas de capacitar a las personas para hacer cirugía. Es comparar las cosas buenas y malas de usar un modelo de una caja para entrenar a las personas, en comparación con no usar ningún modelo, o usar modelos de animales o modelos de cadáveres. Se trata específicamente de personas que nunca antes se han hecho una cirugía.
old_gold: We sought to determine whether the box model training is useful in such trainees in terms of improving technical outcomes by performing a thorough search of the medical literature for randomised clinical trials.

input: Statins have an important role in primary prevention of cardiovascular events and mortality in people who have CKD.
output: Statins are medicines that can help keep your heart and blood vessels healthy and help prevent serious heart problems and even death in people who have Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD).
gold: Aunque la administración de estatinas no redujo claramente los riesgos de progresión de la nefropatía, pueden recomendarse para reducir los riesgos de muerte y eventos cardíacos en pacientes con nefropatía en estadio inicial.
translated_output: Las estatinas son medicamentos que pueden ayudar a mantener sanos el corazón y los vasos sanguíneos y ayudar a prevenir problemas cardíacos graves e incluso la muerte en personas que padecen enfermedad renal crónica (ERC).
old_gold: Although use of statins did not clearly reduce risks of kidney disease progression, they can be recommended to reduce risks of death and heart-related events in people with early stages of kidney disease.

input: Randomised controlled trials, controlled clinical trials and non-randomised studies (if they reported on outcome stratified by antithrombotic treatment and included at least four patients) of anticoagulants or antiplatelet agents for the treatment of extracranial internal carotid artery dissection.
output: This sentence is talking about different kinds of tests that scientists do to see if taking certain medications helps people with a certain medical condition called "extracranial internal carotid artery dissection." In the tests, they look at how well the medications work, and they compare the results between people who took the medicines and people who did not. The tests have to have a lot of people in them and have to be carefully planned so that the results are reliable.
gold: Los fármacos que diluyen la sangre como la aspirina y los anticoagulantes pueden prevenir la formación de coágulos y, de esta manera, prevenir el accidente cerebrovascular en pacientes con disección carotídea.
translated_output: Esta oración se refiere a diferentes tipos de pruebas que realizan los científicos para ver si tomar ciertos medicamentos ayuda a las personas con cierta afección médica llamada "disección de la arteria carótida interna extracraneal". En las pruebas, observan qué tan bien funcionan los medicamentos y comparan los resultados entre las personas que tomaron los medicamentos y las personas que no los tomaron. Las pruebas deben tener muchas personas en ellas y deben planificarse cuidadosamente para que los resultados sean confiables.
old_gold: Blood thinning drugs such as aspirin and anticoagulants might prevent clots forming and so prevent stroke in people with carotid artery dissection.

input: The adverse events most commonly reported were mild and transient such as skin irritation, itching, burning, and stinging.
output: The most common side effects of this medicine were not serious. They were things like skin irritation, itching, burning, and stinging, but they were usually mild and did not last very long.
gold: Los efectos secundarios informados con mayor frecuencia por los participantes y los médicos fueron sequedad, enrojecimiento e hipersensibilidad de la piel.
translated_output: Los efectos secundarios más comunes de este medicamento no fueron graves. Eran cosas como irritación de la piel, picazón, ardor y escozor, pero por lo general eran leves y no duraban mucho.
old_gold: The side-effects reported most frequently by both participants and clinicians were dry, red, and sore skin.

input: This is time consuming, costly, and of variable effectiveness.
output: This means that it takes a lot of time, money and it doesn't always work the way you want it to.
gold: Esta práctica es costosa, lenta y de efectividad variable.
translated_output: Esto significa que requiere mucho tiempo, dinero y no siempre funciona como usted desea.
old_gold: This is costly, time consuming, and is of variable effectiveness.

input: No reports described adverse effects associated with the drugs in those trials that reported in this outcome.
output: The drugs tested in those trials did not cause any bad effects, and the results showed this.
gold: No hubo ninguna investigación de los efectos secundarios de los antibióticos en estos estudios, aunque en los estudios en los que se investigaron los efectos secundarios, no se encontraron efectos secundarios.
translated_output: Los medicamentos probados en esos ensayos no causaron ningún efecto negativo, y los resultados así lo demostraron.
old_gold: There was no investigation of side effects of antibiotics in these studies, but in the studies where side effects were investigated, no side effects were found.

input: We searched trial registers and reference lists of reviews for further studies.
output: We looked in lists of information about trials and reviews to find more studies.
gold: En las bases de datos científicas se buscaron los ensayos controlados aleatorios (ensayos clínicos que asignaron al azar a los pacientes a uno de dos o más tratamientos) que consideraron los efectos del tai chi sobre los adultos con alto riesgo de desarrollar EC.
translated_output: Se buscaron listas de información sobre ensayos y revisiones para encontrar más estudios.
old_gold: We searched scientific databases for randomised controlled trials (clinical trials where people are allocated at random to one of two or more treatments) looking at the effects of tai chi on adults at high risk of developing CVD.

input: Thrombolysis, fibrin sheath disruption and over-the-wire catheter exchange are effective and appropriate therapies for immediately restoring catheter patency in dysfunctional cuffed and tunnelled HD catheters.
output: Thrombolysis, fibrin sheath disruption and over-the-wire catheter exchange are all ways to help catheters that are not working well. They can help the catheters work better quickly, especially if they are made of special materials and have a tunnel.
gold: El intercambio del catéter puede ser mejor que la alteración de la vaina para la supervivencia del catéter a largo plazo y el uso de ambas técnicas juntas probablemente es mejor.
translated_output: La trombólisis, la ruptura de la vaina de fibrina y el intercambio de catéteres sobre el alambre son formas de ayudar a los catéteres que no funcionan bien. Pueden ayudar a que los catéteres funcionen mejor rápidamente, especialmente si están hechos de materiales especiales y tienen un túnel.
old_gold: Catheter exchange may be better than sheath disruption for long-term catheter survival and the use of both techniques together is probably best.

input: To assess the safety, benefits, and harms of different gases (i.e.
output: To look at how safe, helpful, and dangerous different types of gases are.
gold: ¿Cuáles son los beneficios y los daños de varios gases para la insuflación (inflación con gas) de la cavidad abdominal (barriga) para permitir un acceso más fácil a los órganos durante la cirugía abdominal laparoscópica (ojo de cerradura)?
translated_output: Para ver qué tan seguros, útiles y peligrosos son los diferentes tipos de gases.
old_gold: What are the benefits and harms of various gases for insufflation (inflation with gas) of the abdominal (tummy) cavity to allow easier access to organs during laparoscopic (key-hole) abdominal surgery?

input: The quality of studies evaluating melasma treatments was generally poor and available treatments inadequate.
output: The research studies done to find treatments for melasma were not very good and the treatments that are available are not very helpful.
gold: Sin embargo, muchos estudios fueron de calidad deficiente, con un escaso número de participantes.
translated_output: Los estudios de investigación realizados para encontrar tratamientos para el melasma no fueron muy buenos y los tratamientos disponibles no son muy útiles.
old_gold: However, many studies were of a poor quality with a only small number of participants.

input: Excluding clofibrate trials, as the use of clofibrate was discontinued in 2002 due to safety concerns, the remaining class of fibrates were no longer effective in preventing the primary composite outcome (RR 0.90, 95% CI 0.79 to 1.03; participants = 10,320; studies = 7; I2 = 50%, random effects).
output: After 2002, when doctors stopped using clofibrate because it was not safe, the other medicines in this class of drugs were not able to prevent a certain medical outcome. The outcome was seen in 10,320 people who were studied in 7 different studies. Half of the studies showed different results.
gold: Sin embargo, este efecto beneficioso depende de la inclusión de los datos del clofibrato, un fármaco que se suspendió en 2002 debido a problemas de seguridad.
translated_output: Después de 2002, cuando los médicos dejaron de usar clofibrato porque no era seguro, los otros medicamentos de esta clase no pudieron prevenir un determinado resultado médico. El resultado se observó en 10 320 personas que se estudiaron en 7 estudios diferentes. La mitad de los estudios mostraron resultados diferentes.
old_gold: However, this beneficial effect relies on the inclusion on data from clofibrates, a drug that was discontinued in 2002 because of safety concerns.

input: We also searched the Allied and complementary Medicine Database (AMED) and OpenGrey (inception to October 2012) and several Asian databases.
output: We looked for information on Allied and complementary Medicine in two places: AMED and OpenGrey (from October 2012 to now). We also looked for information in several databases from Asian countries.
gold: En las bases de datos científicas se buscaron los ensayos controlados aleatorios (ensayos clínicos que asignaron al azar a los pacientes a uno de dos o más tratamientos) que consideraron los efectos del tai chi sobre los adultos con alto riesgo de desarrollar EC.
translated_output: Buscamos información sobre medicinas afines y complementarias en dos lugares: AMED y OpenGrey (desde octubre de 2012 hasta ahora). También buscamos información en varias bases de datos de países asiáticos.
old_gold: We searched scientific databases for randomised controlled trials (clinical trials where people are allocated at random to one of two or more treatments) looking at the effects of tai chi on adults at high risk of developing CVD.

input: We included randomised controlled trials (RCTs) comparing RIC with sham RIC or medical management in people with ischaemic stroke or at risk of ischaemic stroke.
output: We looked at studies that compared a certain medical treatment called RIC with either a fake treatment or other medical treatments with people who had a stroke or were at risk of having a stroke.
gold: Los estudios compararon CIR con CIR simulado o tratamiento médico en pacientes con accidente cerebrovascular isquémico o con riesgo de accidente cerebrovascular isquémico.
translated_output: Examinamos estudios que compararon un determinado tratamiento médico llamado RIC con un tratamiento falso u otros tratamientos médicos en personas que sufrieron un accidente cerebrovascular o estaban en riesgo de sufrir un accidente cerebrovascular.
old_gold: The studies compared RIC with sham RIC or medical management in people with ischaemic stroke or at risk of ischaemic stroke.

input: We included randomised controlled trials (RCTs) involving people undergoing orthognathic surgery comparing one regimen of antibiotic prophylaxis with any other regimen or placebo.
output: We looked at studies involving people who had orthognathic surgery, where some people took antibiotics, some people took other medicines, and some people took a fake medicine. We wanted to see which worked best.
