translated_output: Examinamos estudios que compararon a personas que hicieron ejercicios con un entrenador modelo de caja con personas que no hicieron ejercicios antes de someterse a la cirugía, para ver si los ejercicios les ayudaron a aprender a realizar mejor la cirugía.
old_gold: Randomised clinical trials are commonly called randomised controlled trials and are the best study design to answer such questions.

input: The use of blunt needles reduced the risk of glove perforations with a relative risk (RR) of 0.46 (95% confidence interval (CI) 0.38 to 0.54) compared to sharp needles.
output: Using blunt needles instead of sharp needles decreases the chance of gloves getting holes in them by almost half. We are sure of this because we studied a lot of people and found that the chance was 0.46, which means almost half.
gold: El uso de las agujas con punta roma redujo el riesgo de perforaciones del guante en un 54% (intervalo de confianza del 95%: 46% a 62%) en comparación con las agujas afiladas.
translated_output: El uso de agujas desafiladas en lugar de agujas afiladas reduce casi a la mitad la posibilidad de que los guantes se agujeren. Estamos seguros de esto porque estudiamos a mucha gente y descubrimos que la probabilidad era de 0,46, lo que significa casi la mitad.
old_gold: The use of blunt needles reduced the risk of glove perforations by 54% (95% confidence interval 46% to 62%) compared to sharp needles.

input: They can be grouped into those including a bleaching agent such as hydroquinone, triple-combination creams (hydroquinone, tretinoin, and fluocinolone acetonide), and combination therapies (hydroquinone cream and glycolic acid peels), as well as less conventional therapies including rucinol, vitamin C iontophoresis, and skin-lightening complexes like Thiospot and Gigawhite.
output: There are different types of treatments for skin lightening. Some of these treatments include a bleaching agent (like hydroquinone), a cream made of three different ingredients (hydroquinone, tretinoin, and fluocinolone acetonide), a combination of a cream and a special type of peel (hydroquinone cream and glycolic acid peels). Other more uncommon treatments are rucinol, a type of electric therapy (vitamin C iontophoresis), and special skin-lightening complexes (like Thiospot and Gigawhite).
gold: hidroquinona), cremas para el acné (p.ej.
translated_output: Existen diferentes tipos de tratamientos para aclarar la piel. Algunos de estos tratamientos incluyen un agente blanqueador (como la hidroquinona), una crema hecha de tres ingredientes diferentes (hidroquinona, tretinoína y acetónido de fluocinolona), una combinación de una crema y un tipo especial de exfoliación (crema de hidroquinona y exfoliación con ácido glicólico). Otros tratamientos menos comunes son el rucinol, un tipo de terapia eléctrica (iontoforesis con vitamina C) y complejos especiales para aclarar la piel (como Thiospot y Gigawhite).
old_gold: hydroquinone), acne creams (e.g.

input: To compare, among patients treated with either anticoagulants or antiplatelet agents, the risk of ischaemic strokes and major bleeding episodes.
output: This sentence is looking at two different types of medicine - anticoagulants and antiplatelet agents - and comparing how likely it is for people taking either of these medicines to have a stroke or to have bleeding episodes.
gold: Solamente se encontraron ensayos no aleatorios de calidad deficiente que compararon anticoagulantes con aspirina.
translated_output: Esta oración analiza dos tipos diferentes de medicamentos, anticoagulantes y agentes antiplaquetarios, y compara la probabilidad de que las personas que toman cualquiera de estos medicamentos sufran un accidente cerebrovascular o episodios de sangrado.
old_gold: We found only poor quality non-randomised studies that compared anticoagulants with aspirin.

input: There were no serious adverse events related to either nitrous oxide or carbon dioxide pneumoperitoneum (three studies; 196 participants; very low quality of evidence).
output: The three studies done with 196 people showed that there were no bad effects from breathing either nitrogen gas or carbon dioxide gas during a medical procedure.
gold: No está claro si existen o no diferencias en el número de personas con complicaciones cardiopulmonares (corazón y pulmones) o complicaciones quirúrgicas entre el dióxido de carbono y el óxido nitroso.
translated_output: Los tres estudios realizados con 196 personas mostraron que no hubo efectos negativos al respirar gas nitrógeno o dióxido de carbono durante un procedimiento médico.
old_gold: We are uncertain as to whether there are differences in the number of people with heart or lung complications or surgical complications between nitrous oxide and carbon dioxide.

input: The improved success rate at the first attempt may be more pronounced in infants and small children, in whom arterial line cannulation is more challenging than in older children.
output: This sentence means that when doctors try to put a tube into a baby or small child's artery, it is harder than it is for an older child. But, when doctors do succeed the first time, it is a more noticeable success than when they are working with an older child.
gold: Es probable que la ecografía sea más útil para los neonatos y los niños pequeños que para los niños mayores.
translated_output: Esta oración significa que cuando los médicos intentan colocar un tubo en la arteria de un bebé o un niño pequeño, es más difícil que para un niño mayor. Pero, cuando los médicos tienen éxito la primera vez, es un éxito más notable que cuando están trabajando con un niño mayor.
old_gold: It is likely that ultrasound is more useful for infants and small children than for older children.

input: We searched the Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials (CENTRAL; Issue 9, 2014) on the Cochrane Library, MEDLINE (OVID, 1946 to October week 1 2014), EMBASE (OVID, 1980 to 2014 week 41), the China Biological Medicine Database (CBM) (1978 to 2014), the Chinese National Knowledge Infrastructure (CNKI) (1979 to 2014), Chinese Science and Technique Journals Database (VIP) (1989 to 2014).
output: We looked through a lot of different databases to find information about scientific studies. We looked in the Cochrane Library, MEDLINE, EMBASE, the China Biological Medicine Database, the Chinese National Knowledge Infrastructure, and the Chinese Science and Technique Journals Database. We looked at information from as far back as 1946 until October 2014.
gold: Esta revisión incluye evidencia identificada hasta octubre de 2014.
translated_output: Buscamos en muchas bases de datos diferentes para encontrar información sobre estudios científicos. Buscamos en la Biblioteca Cochrane, MEDLINE, EMBASE, la Base de datos de medicina biológica de China, la Infraestructura de conocimiento nacional de China y la Base de datos de revistas científicas y técnicas de China. Analizamos información desde 1946 hasta octubre de 2014.
old_gold: This review includes evidence identified up to October 2014.

input: All studies had at least one domain with unclear risk of bias, and some studies were at high risk of bias for allocation concealment (one study) and selective reporting (two studies).
output: This sentence is talking about different studies that were done. All the studies had something that was not clear about how reliable the results were. For some of the studies, it was hard to tell if the results were fair because of how the study was set up, and some of the studies were not reported on completely.
gold: Los resultados de esta revisión se deben tratar con cuidado ya que los estudios fueron pequeños, de corta duración y hubo algún riesgo de sesgo (cuando hubo riesgo de establecer conclusiones erróneas debido al favoritismo de los participantes o los investigadores).
translated_output: Esta oración está hablando de diferentes estudios que se realizaron. Todos los estudios tenían algo que no estaba claro acerca de cuán confiables eran los resultados. Para algunos de los estudios, fue difícil saber si los resultados fueron justos debido a cómo se organizó el estudio, y algunos de los estudios no se informaron por completo.
old_gold: The results of this review should be treated with caution as the studies were small, of short duration and there was some risk of bias (where there was a risk of arriving at the wrong conclusions because of favouritism by the participants or researchers).

input: To compare the efficacy and continuation rates of the sponge with the diaphragm (used with nonoxynol-9).
output: This sentence is asking us to look at two different types of birth control methods: the sponge and the diaphragm. We want to see how well they work in preventing pregnancy and how often people use them.
gold: Esta revisión comparó la eficacia de estos dos métodos en la prevención del embarazo.
translated_output: Esta oración nos pide que observemos dos tipos diferentes de métodos anticonceptivos: la esponja y el diafragma. Queremos ver qué tan bien funcionan en la prevención del embarazo y con qué frecuencia las personas los usan.
old_gold: This review compared how well these two methods work in preventing pregnancy.

input: Postoperative complications as well as cost and time to work resumption were less in the aspiration and sclerotherapy group; however the recurrence rate was higher.
output: People who had aspiration and sclerotherapy for a medical condition had fewer problems afterwards, took less time to get better, and cost less money. However, there was a higher chance that the medical condition might come back.
gold: Las complicaciones posoperatorias como la infección y la fiebre, así como el costo y el tiempo hasta el retorno al trabajo fueron menos significativas en el grupo de aspiración y escleroterapia; sin embargo, la tasa de recurrencia fue mayor.
translated_output: Las personas que se sometieron a aspiración y escleroterapia por una afección médica tuvieron menos problemas después, tardaron menos en mejorar y costaron menos dinero. Sin embargo, había una mayor probabilidad de que la afección médica regresara.
old_gold: Postoperative complications such as infection and fever, as well as cost and time to work resumption were less in the aspiration and sclerotherapy group; however the recurrence rate was higher.

input: Two authors independently identified trials and collected data.
output: Two different people looked at different studies and gathered information from them.
gold: Dos autores de la revisión buscaron en la literatura médica disponible hasta mayo de 2013 y obtuvieron la información de los ensayos identificados.
translated_output: Dos personas diferentes observaron diferentes estudios y recopilaron información de ellos.
old_gold: Two review authors searched the medical literature available to May 2013 and obtained the information from the identified trials.

input: We searched the Cochrane Stroke Group Trials Register (16 January 2018), the Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials (CENTRAL; 2017, Issue 12) in the Cochrane Library (January 2018), MEDLINE Ovid (1946 to January 2018), Embase Ovid (1974 to January 2018), Web of Science Core Collection (1950 to January 2018) and three Chinese databases (January 2018).
output: We looked for information about stroke from six different places: the Cochrane Stroke Group Trials Register, the Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials, the Cochrane Library, MEDLINE Ovid, Embase Ovid, Web of Science Core Collection, and three Chinese databases. We looked for information from 1946 to January 2018.
gold: Los resultados de esta revisión están vigentes hasta enero de 2018.
translated_output: Buscamos información sobre el accidente cerebrovascular en seis lugares diferentes: el Registro de ensayos del Grupo Cochrane de Accidentes Cerebrovasculares, el Registro Central Cochrane de Ensayos Controlados, la Biblioteca Cochrane, MEDLINE Ovid, Embase Ovid, Web of Science Core Collection y tres bases de datos chinas. Buscamos información desde 1946 hasta enero de 2018.
old_gold: The results of this review are current up to January 2018.

input: Only a few reported how many people had good pain relief, but where it was reported, over 90% had no worse than mild pain within a reasonably short time period.
output: Out of all the people who had pain, only a few people knew how many of them felt relief. But for those people who did report how they felt, more than 90% of them said their pain was not too bad and it didn't last very long.
gold: Más de nueve de cada diez participantes presentaron dolor que pasó de moderado o intenso antes de tomar morfina a dolor que no fue peor que el leve al tomar morfina.
translated_output: De todas las personas que tenían dolor, solo unas pocas sabían cuántas sentían alivio. Pero para aquellas personas que informaron cómo se sintieron, más del 90 % dijeron que su dolor no era tan intenso y que no duró mucho.
old_gold: More than 9 in 10 participants had pain that went from moderate or severe before taking morphine to pain that was no worse than mild when taking morphine.

input: Overall, long-term antibiotic prophylaxis probably reduces the risk of SSI (plausible effects range between a 76% to a 0.26% relative reduction in SSI with long-term antibiotic prophylaxis) (472 participants; RR 0.42, 95% CI 0.24 to 0.74; moderate-quality evidence).
output: Taking antibiotics regularly for a long period of time may reduce the risk of infection from a surgery. In a study of 472 people, the risk of infection was reduced by 42%, which means the risk of infection was cut in half.
gold: En términos generales, los antibióticos a largo plazo reducen el riesgo de ISQ y hay dudas con respecto a los efectos de recibir una dosis preoperatoria de antibióticos versus antibióticos a corto plazo.
translated_output: Tomar antibióticos regularmente durante un período prolongado puede reducir el riesgo de infección por una cirugía. En un estudio de 472 personas, el riesgo de infección se redujo en un 42 %, lo que significa que el riesgo de infección se redujo a la mitad.
old_gold: Overall, long-term antibiotics reduce the risk of SSI, and there is uncertainty regarding the effects of receiving one dose of antibiotics preoperatively versus short term antibiotics.

input: There is qualitative evidence that oral morphine has much the same efficacy as other available opioids.
output: Studies have shown that taking oral morphine is just as effective at treating pain as other types of medicine used to treat pain.
gold: Por un lado, estos son buenos resultados.
translated_output: Los estudios han demostrado que tomar morfina oral es tan efectivo para tratar el dolor como otros tipos de medicamentos que se usan para tratar el dolor.
old_gold: At one level these are good results.

input: We are uncertain whether oxandrolone increases or decreases the risk of serious adverse events as we assessed the certainty of the evidence as very low.
output: This sentence means that we don't know if oxandrolone makes it more or less likely for bad things to happen. We looked at the evidence and it was very unclear.
gold: Debido a los datos limitados disponibles de un ensayo, persiste la incertidumbre con respecto a si los esteroides anabolizantes tienen efectos beneficiosos sobre la cicatrización de la úlcera por presión, si el tratamiento provoca un aumento de los eventos adversos graves y si el tratamiento puede aumentar el riesgo de eventos adversos no graves.
translated_output: Esta oración significa que no sabemos si la oxandrolona hace que sea más o menos probable que sucedan cosas malas. Miramos la evidencia y no estaba muy claro.
old_gold: Because of the limited data available from one trial, we remain uncertain whether anabolic steroids have beneficial effects on pressure ulcer healing, whether the treatment causes increased serious adverse events and if the treatment may increase the risk of non-serious adverse events.

input: carbon dioxide, helium, argon, nitrogen, nitrous oxide, and room air) used for establishing pneumoperitoneum in participants undergoing laparoscopic general abdominal or gynaecological pelvic surgery.
output: These are different types of gases that are used in surgery to help doctors perform operations on the abdomen and pelvis.
gold: ¿Cuáles son los beneficios y los daños de varios gases para la insuflación (inflación con gas) de la cavidad abdominal (barriga) para permitir un acceso más fácil a los órganos durante la cirugía abdominal laparoscópica (ojo de cerradura)?
translated_output: Estos son diferentes tipos de gases que se utilizan en cirugía para ayudar a los médicos a realizar operaciones en el abdomen y la pelvis.
old_gold: What are the benefits and harms of various gases for insufflation (inflation with gas) of the abdominal (tummy) cavity to allow easier access to organs during laparoscopic (key-hole) abdominal surgery?

input: Potential harms from statin therapy were limited by lack of systematic reporting and were uncertain in analyses that had few events: elevated creatine kinase (7 studies, 4514 participants; RR 0.84, 95% CI 0.20 to 3.48), liver function abnormalities (7 studies, RR 0.76, 95% CI 0.39 to 1.50), withdrawal due to adverse events (13 studies, 4219 participants; RR 1.16, 95% CI 0.84 to 1.60), and cancer (2 studies, 5581 participants; RR 1.03, 95% CI 0.82 to 130).
output: This sentence tells us about how taking statin therapy (medicine) can affect people's health. Scientists looked at different groups of people who took the medicine and they found that it was unlikely to cause any problems. They looked at 4514 people with elevated creatine kinase (a type of enzyme) and found that taking statin therapy was not likely to cause any harm (risk ratio of 0.84). They also looked at people who had liver function abnormalities and those who withdrew due to side effects, and again found that taking statin therapy was not likely to cause any harm (risk ratio of 0.76 and 1.16 respectively). Finally, they looked at people with cancer and found that taking statin therapy was not likely to cause any harm (risk ratio of 1.03).
gold: Se encontró que estos temas no se analizaron de forma adecuada en los estudios que se evaluaron, y que estos efectos no se comprenden bien.
translated_output: Esta oración nos habla de cómo la terapia con estatinas (medicina) puede afectar la salud de las personas. Los científicos observaron diferentes grupos de personas que tomaron el medicamento y descubrieron que era poco probable que causara algún problema. Examinaron a 4514 personas con niveles elevados de creatina quinasa (un tipo de enzima) y descubrieron que no era probable que tomar una terapia con estatinas causara ningún daño (proporción de riesgo de 0,84). También observaron a las personas que tenían anomalías en la función hepática y a las que se retiraron debido a los efectos secundarios, y nuevamente encontraron que no era probable que tomar la terapia con estatinas causara ningún daño (índice de riesgo de 0,76 y 1,16 respectivamente). Finalmente, observaron a las personas con cáncer y descubrieron que no era probable que tomar la terapia con estatinas causara ningún daño (proporción de riesgo de 1,03).
old_gold: We found that these issues were not analysed well in the studies we evaluated, and these effects are not well understood.

input: Thiospot was more effective than placebo (SMD -2.61, 95% CI -3.76 to -1.47).
output: Thiospot was a medicine that was tested to see if it worked better than a dummy medicine (placebo). The test showed that the real medicine worked much better than the dummy medicine. The difference between the real medicine and the dummy medicine was very strong.
gold: La tretinoina fue más eficaz para aclarar el melasma comparada con placebo, al igual que el complejo blanqueador de la piel Thiospot.
translated_output: Thiospot fue un medicamento que se probó para ver si funcionaba mejor que un medicamento ficticio (placebo). La prueba mostró que el medicamento real funcionó mucho mejor que el medicamento ficticio. La diferencia entre la medicina real y la medicina ficticia era muy grande.
old_gold: Tretinoin was more effective at lightening melasma compared to placebo, as was the skin-whitening complex Thiospot.

input: Morphine has been used for many years to relieve pain.
output: Morphine is a medicine that doctors have been giving to people for a long time to help make their pain go away.
gold: La morfina administrada por vía oral produjo un buen alivio del dolor para la mayoría de los pacientes con dolor por cáncer moderado o intenso.
translated_output: La morfina es un medicamento que los médicos han estado administrando a las personas durante mucho tiempo para ayudar a que el dolor desaparezca.
old_gold: Morphine taken by mouth produced good pain relief for most people with moderate or severe cancer pain.

input: The contraceptive vaginal sponge was developed as an alternative to the contraceptive diaphragm.
output: The contraceptive vaginal sponge is a type of birth control that was created as a different option to the contraceptive diaphragm.
gold: El diafragma es un círculo de goma que se coloca en el canal de parto.
translated_output: La esponja vaginal anticonceptiva es un tipo de método anticonceptivo que se creó como una opción diferente al diafragma anticonceptivo.
old_gold: The diaphragm is a rubber circle that goes in the birth canal.

input: The conclusions have not changed for this update.
output: The results of this update are the same as before.
gold: Por un lado, estos son buenos resultados.
translated_output: Los resultados de esta actualización son los mismos que antes.
old_gold: At one level these are good results.

input: We included 50 studies (45,285 participants): 47 studies (39,820 participants) compared statins with placebo or no treatment and three studies (5547 participants) compared two different statin regimens in adults with CKD who were not yet on dialysis.
output: This sentence is talking about a group of studies that were done to look at how different medicines might help adults with a condition called CKD. 50 studies were done in total, with 45,285 people taking part in them. 47 of those studies looked at how a medicine called a statin might help people who didn't have any other treatments, and 3 studies looked at how two different statins might help people with CKD. In total, 39,820 people were involved in the 47 studies and 5,547 people were involved in the 3 studies.
gold: Se revisaron 50 estudios publicados antes de junio de 2012 relacionados con el tratamiento con estatinas en más de 45 000 pacientes con NC que no necesitaban tratamiento con diálisis.
translated_output: Esta oración se refiere a un grupo de estudios que se realizaron para ver cómo diferentes medicamentos podrían ayudar a los adultos con una afección llamada CKD. Se realizaron 50 estudios en total, con la participación de 45.285 personas. 47 de esos estudios analizaron cómo un medicamento llamado estatina podría ayudar a las personas que no recibieron ningún otro tratamiento, y 3 estudios analizaron cómo dos estatinas diferentes podrían ayudar a las personas con ERC. En total, 39 820 personas participaron en los 47 estudios y 5547 personas participaron en los 3 estudios.
old_gold: We looked at 50 studies published before June 2012 concerning statin treatment in over 45,000 people with CKD who did not need dialysis treatment.

input: The review demonstrates the wide dose range of morphine used in studies, and that a small percentage of participants are unable to tolerate oral morphine.
output: The review shows that a lot of different doses of morphine have been used in studies, and that a few people who tried it could not handle taking it by mouth.
gold: Los estudios a menudo fueron pequeños, compararon muchos preparados diferentes y usaron diferentes diseños de estudio.
translated_output: La revisión muestra que se han usado muchas dosis diferentes de morfina en los estudios, y que algunas personas que la probaron no pudieron soportar tomarla por vía oral.
old_gold: The studies were often small, compared many different preparations, and used different study designs.

input: The results of this review are threatened by both risks of systematic errors (bias) and risks of random errors (play of chance).
output: The findings of this study could be wrong because of both things that could be caused by people making mistakes, and things that could happen by chance.
gold: En general, la calidad de las pruebas fue muy baja.
translated_output: Los hallazgos de este estudio podrían estar equivocados debido a cosas que podrían ser causadas por personas que cometen errores y cosas que podrían suceder por casualidad.
old_gold: Overall, the quality of evidence was very low.

input: This review describes the results of trials of blood (asexual)-stage vaccines.
output: This review talks about what happened when different vaccines were tested on people's blood.
gold: Esta revisión analizó las vacunas dirigidas a la fase asexuada (sangre) de la vida del parásito, cuando los parásitos se encuentran en los glóbulos rojos.
translated_output: Esta revisión habla sobre lo que sucedió cuando se probaron diferentes vacunas en la sangre de las personas.
old_gold: This review looked at vaccinations targeted at the asexual (blood) phase of the parasite's life, when the parasites are in red blood cells.

input: In March 2017 we searched the Cochrane Wounds Specialised Register; the Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials (CENTRAL); Ovid MEDLINE (including In-Process & Other Non-Indexed Citations); Ovid Embase and EBSCO CINAHL Plus.
output: In March 2017, we looked through different databases to find information about wounds. The databases we looked through were the Cochrane Wounds Specialised Register, Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials, Ovid MEDLINE, Ovid Embase, and EBSCO CINAHL Plus.
gold: En marzo de 2017, se buscaron los ensayos controlados aleatorizados que compararon la administración de esteroides anabolizantes con otros tratamientos para las úlceras por presión.
translated_output: En marzo de 2017, buscamos en diferentes bases de datos información sobre heridas. Las bases de datos que examinamos fueron el Registro Especializado Cochrane de Heridas, el Registro Central Cochrane de Ensayos Controlados, Ovid MEDLINE, Ovid Embase y EBSCO CINAHL Plus.
old_gold: In March 2017, we searched for randomised controlled trials, which compared the use of anabolic steroids with other treatments for pressure ulcers.

input: Extracranial internal carotid artery dissection (eICAD) is a leading cause of stroke in younger patients.
output: eICAD is a medical condition where the carotid artery, which is located near your neck, gets a tear or cut in it. This can cause a stroke, which is when part of the brain stops getting enough blood and oxygen. This can happen to younger people, and it is one of the most common causes of stroke in this age group.
gold: En el sitio donde se desgarra la arteria, se pueden formar coágulos sanguíneos.
translated_output: eICAD es una afección médica en la que la arteria carótida, que se encuentra cerca de su cuello, se desgarra o se corta. Esto puede causar un derrame cerebral, que es cuando una parte del cerebro deja de recibir suficiente sangre y oxígeno. Esto puede sucederle a personas más jóvenes y es una de las causas más comunes de accidente cerebrovascular en este grupo de edad.
old_gold: Blood clots can form where the artery is torn.

input: In the larger USA trial, the 12-month cumulative life-table termination rates per 100 women for overall pregnancy were 17.4 for the sponge and 12.8 for the diaphragm.
output: In a big study in the United States, out of 100 women who used a sponge to prevent pregnancy, 17 of them got pregnant in a year. Out of 100 women who used a diaphragm, only 13 of them got pregnant in a year.
gold: De cada 100 mujeres que utilizaron la esponja durante un año, unas 17 quedaron embarazadas.
translated_output: En un gran estudio en los Estados Unidos, de 100 mujeres que usaron una esponja para prevenir el embarazo, 17 de ellas quedaron embarazadas en un año. De 100 mujeres que usaron un diafragma, solo 13 de ellas quedaron embarazadas en un año.
old_gold: For every 100 women who used the sponge for a year, about 17 got pregnant.

input: Azelaic acid (20%) was significantly more effective than 2% hydroquinone (RR 1.25, 95% CI 1.06 to 1.48) at lightening melasma but not when compared to 4% hydroquinone (RR 1.11, 95% CI 0.94 to 1.32).
output: Azelaic acid was better at making dark spots on the skin lighter than 2% hydroquinone. It did not work as well as 4% hydroquinone, but it worked better than 2%.
gold: La crema de combinación triple fue significativamente más eficaz para aclarar el melasma comparada con la hidroquinona sola o con las combinaciones duales como la tretinoina y la hidroquinona, la tretinoina y el acetónido de fluocinolona, o la hidroquinona y el acetónido de fluocinolona.
translated_output: El ácido azelaico fue mejor para aclarar las manchas oscuras de la piel que la hidroquinona al 2%. No funcionó tan bien como la hidroquinona al 4 %, pero funcionó mejor que la hidroquinona al 2 %.
old_gold: Triple-combination cream was significantly more effective at lightening melasma when compared to hydroquinone alone or to dual combinations such as tretinoin and hydroquinone, tretinoin and fluocinolone acetonide, or hydroquinone and fluocinolone acetonide.

input: Addiction to nicotine usually begins during early adolescence and young people who reach the age of 18 as non-smokers are unlikely to become smokers thereafter.
output: If you are 18 years old and you have never smoked, it is unlikely that you will start smoking later. Nicotine addiction usually starts when you are a teenager.
gold: Los jóvenes permanecen en riesgo de comenzar a fumar.
translated_output: Si tiene 18 años y nunca ha fumado, es poco probable que empiece a fumar más tarde. La adicción a la nicotina suele comenzar en la adolescencia.
old_gold: Young people remain at particular risk of taking up smoking.

input: To compare, among patients treated with either anticoagulants or antiplatelet agents, the risk of ischaemic strokes and major bleeding episodes.
output: This sentence is asking about two different types of medicines that are used to help prevent strokes. It is trying to find out if taking one type of medicine or the other puts people at a higher risk for having a stroke, or for having serious bleeding problems.
gold: Se necesita más investigación.
translated_output: Esta oración pregunta sobre dos tipos diferentes de medicamentos que se usan para ayudar a prevenir accidentes cerebrovasculares. Está tratando de averiguar si tomar un tipo de medicamento u otro aumenta el riesgo de que las personas sufran un derrame cerebral o tengan problemas de sangrado graves.
old_gold: More research is needed.

input: In IVF procedures, oocytes and sperm are routinely co-incubated overnight, which may expose oocytes and zygotes to suboptimal culture conditions with increased reactive oxygen species (ROS) produced by sperm in this long term culture.
output: In IVF (in vitro fertilization), eggs and sperm are put together in a dish and allowed to sit together overnight. This may not be the best environment for the eggs and early embryos because the sperm can create chemicals that can be harmful to them.
gold: Esta coincubación a largo plazo con espermatozoides puede exponer a los ovocitos y los cigotos a un medio de cultivo subóptimo debido al aumento de los niveles de especies de oxígeno reactivo (EOR) producidas por los espermatozoides y otros productos del metabolismo.
translated_output: En la FIV (fertilización in vitro), los óvulos y los espermatozoides se juntan en un plato y se dejan reposar juntos durante la noche. Es posible que este no sea el mejor entorno para los óvulos y los embriones tempranos porque los espermatozoides pueden crear sustancias químicas que pueden ser perjudiciales para ellos.
old_gold: Such long term co-incubation with sperm may expose oocytes and zygotes to suboptimal culture medium due to increased levels of reactive oxygen species (ROS) produced by sperm and other products of metabolism.

input: Pressure ulcers, also known as bed sores, pressure sores or decubitus ulcers develop as a result of a localised injury to the skin or underlying tissue, or both.
output: A pressure ulcer is when your skin gets hurt from staying in the same place for too long. It is also sometimes called a bed sore, pressure sore, or decubitus ulcer. These kinds of skin injuries happen when you are not able to move around and change positions.
gold: La falta de movimiento y la presión mantenida sobre la piel que cubre partes óseas del cuerpo como las caderas, los talones, la región lumbar y los codos pueden causar que la piel se rompa y se forme una úlcera.
translated_output: Una úlcera por presión es cuando la piel se lastima por permanecer demasiado tiempo en el mismo lugar. A veces también se le llama úlcera de decúbito, úlcera de decúbito o úlcera de decúbito. Este tipo de lesiones en la piel ocurren cuando no puede moverse ni cambiar de posición.
old_gold: Lack of movement and sustained pressure on the skin over bony parts of the body such as the hips, heels, lower back and elbows can cause the skin to break down and an ulcer to form.

input: To assess the effects of intravenous versus inhalational techniques for rapid emergence from anaesthesia in patients undergoing brain tumour surgery.
output: Doctors want to find out if it is better to give medicine to patients through a needle in the vein or through breathing in medicine to help them wake up quickly after surgery to remove a brain tumor.
gold: Se intentó determinar si las técnicas inyectables fueron mejores o peores que las técnicas gaseosas.
translated_output: Los médicos quieren saber si es mejor administrar medicamentos a los pacientes a través de una aguja en la vena o mediante la inhalación de medicamentos para ayudarlos a despertarse rápidamente después de la cirugía para extirpar un tumor cerebral.
old_gold: We aimed to discover whether injectable techniques were better or worse than gaseous techniques.

input: No new trials have been identified since the initial review.
output: Since the first review, no additional trials have been found.
gold: No se han encontrado ensayos nuevos desde la revisión inicial.
translated_output: Desde la primera revisión, no se han encontrado ensayos adicionales.
old_gold: We have not found any new trials since the initial review.

input: We included five RCTs reporting 444 arterial cannulations in paediatric participants.
output: We studied five groups of children and counted how many times doctors put a tube into their blood vessels (called "arterial cannulations"). In total, 444 kids had a tube put in their blood vessel.
gold: Se encontraron cinco estudios aptos: cuatro que compararon la ecografía con palpación y uno que comparó la ecografía con asistencia auditiva con Doppler.
translated_output: Estudiamos cinco grupos de niños y contamos cuántas veces los médicos colocaron un tubo en sus vasos sanguíneos (llamados "canulaciones arteriales"). En total, a 444 niños se les colocó un tubo en el vaso sanguíneo.
old_gold: We found five eligible studies - four comparing ultrasound with palpation and one comparing ultrasound with Doppler auditory assistance.

input: There were also no randomised trials that directly compared anticoagulants with antiplatelet drugs and the reported non-randomised studies did not show any evidence of a significant difference between the two.
output: This sentence is saying that scientists looked at different types of medicines, anticoagulants and antiplatelet drugs, to see if one was better than the other. They did not find any proof that one was better than the other.
gold: Es probable que la aspirina tenga una eficacia y seguridad similares a las de los anticoagulantes en dichos pacientes.
translated_output: Esta oración dice que los científicos observaron diferentes tipos de medicamentos, anticoagulantes y antiplaquetarios, para ver si uno era mejor que el otro. No encontraron ninguna prueba de que uno fuera mejor que el otro.
old_gold: Aspirin is likely to be similarly effective and safe as anticoagulants in such patients.

input: The outcomes of interest were CVD clinical events and CVD risk factors.
output: We wanted to see what happened with heart and blood vessel diseases and all the things that can increase the chance of getting those diseases.
gold: Esta revisión evaluó la efectividad de las intervenciones de tai chi en adultos sanos y adultos con alto riesgo de EC para reducir la muerte cardiovascular, la muerte por cualquier causa, las variables de evaluación no mortales (como ataques cardíacos, accidentes cerebrovasculares y angina) y los factores de riesgo de EC.
translated_output: Queríamos ver qué sucedía con las enfermedades del corazón y de los vasos sanguíneos y todas las cosas que pueden aumentar la posibilidad de contraer esas enfermedades.
old_gold: This review assessed the effectiveness of tai chi interventions for healthy adults and adults at high risk of CVD at reducing cardiovascular death, all-cause death, non-fatal endpoints (such as heart attacks, strokes and angina) and CVD risk factors.

input: Two authors independently identified trials and collected data.
output: Two different authors studied the same trials and gathered information about them.
gold: El uso de dos autores de la revisión para identificar los estudios y obtener información disminuye los errores en la obtención de la información.
translated_output: Dos autores diferentes estudiaron los mismos ensayos y recopilaron información sobre ellos.
old_gold: The use of two review authors to identify studies and obtain information decreases the errors in obtaining the information.

input: Overall, 16 trials (464 participants) provided data for meta-analysis of box training (248 participants) versus no supplementary training (216 participants).
output: This sentence is about a study that was done to compare two different types of training. There were a total of 16 experiments done with 464 people. In the experiments, 248 people did a special type of training called "box training", and 216 people didn't do any extra training at all. The results of the study are being compared to see which type of training was most effective.
gold: Los ensayos compararon el entrenamiento con simulador versus ningún entrenamiento (16 ensayos; 464 participantes) o versus diferentes tipos de entrenamiento con simulador (14 ensayos; 382 participantes) (algunos ensayos y participantes se incluyeron en ambas comparaciones debido a que los ensayos comparaban diferentes métodos de entrenamiento con simulador versus ningún entrenamiento).
translated_output: Esta oración trata sobre un estudio que se realizó para comparar dos tipos diferentes de entrenamiento. Hubo un total de 16 experimentos realizados con 464 personas. En los experimentos, 248 personas realizaron un tipo especial de entrenamiento llamado "entrenamiento de caja" y 216 personas no realizaron ningún tipo de entrenamiento adicional. Los resultados del estudio se están comparando para ver qué tipo de entrenamiento fue más efectivo.
old_gold: The trials compared box model training versus no training (16 trials; 464 participants) or versus different types of box model training (14 trials; 382 participants) (some trials and participants were included in both comparisons as the trials compared different methods of box training versus no training).

input: For our primary outcomes, pooled results from two trials suggest that time to emergence from anaesthesia, that is, time needed to follow verbal commands, was longer with isoflurane than with propofol (mean difference (MD) -3.29 minutes, 95% confidence interval (CI) -5.41 to -1.18, low-quality evidence), and time to emergence from anaesthesia was not different with sevoflurane compared with propofol (MD 0.28 minutes slower with sevoflurane, 95% CI -0.56 to 1.12, four studies, low-quality evidence).
output: This sentence is talking about two different medical tests that were done to compare the time it takes for someone to wake up after being put to sleep with medicine. The first test shows that it took longer to wake up after being put to sleep with isoflurane than it did with propofol. On average, it took 3.29 minutes longer with isoflurane. The second test showed that there was not much difference between how long it took to wake up after being put to sleep with sevoflurane or propofol. The difference was only 0.28 minutes.
gold: Aunque el isoflurano se asoció con un despertar más lento (alrededor de tres minutos y medio) en comparación con el propofol, los investigadores no encontraron diferencias importante entre el propofol y el sevoflurano.
translated_output: Esta oración habla de dos pruebas médicas diferentes que se realizaron para comparar el tiempo que tarda alguien en despertarse después de haber sido puesto a dormir con medicamentos. La primera prueba muestra que tomó más tiempo despertarse después de dormir con isoflurano que con propofol. En promedio, tomó 3,29 minutos más con isoflurano. La segunda prueba mostró que no había mucha diferencia entre el tiempo que tardaba en despertarse después de haber sido puesto a dormir con sevoflurano o propofol. La diferencia fue de sólo 0,28 minutos.
old_gold: Although isoflurane was associated with slower awakening (about three and a half minutes) compared with propofol, researchers found no important differences between propofol and sevoflurane.

input: Currently, carbon dioxide is the most frequently used gas for insufflation of the abdominal cavity (pneumoperitoneum).
output: Right now, carbon dioxide is the most common gas used to fill up the abdomen with air.
gold: Actualmente, el dióxido de carbono es el gas utilizado con mayor frecuencia para este propósito.
translated_output: En este momento, el dióxido de carbono es el gas más común que se usa para llenar el abdomen con aire.
old_gold: Currently, carbon dioxide is the most frequently used gas for this purpose.

input: However, without clofibrate data, fibrates remained effective in preventing MI (RR 0.85, 95% CI 0.76 to 0.94; participants = 8304; studies = 6; I2 = 47%, fixed effect).
output: This sentence is talking about a study that looked at how taking a type of medicine called fibrates affects the chances of having a heart attack. The study found that taking fibrates can help prevent a heart attack, and the chances of having a heart attack were lower for people who took fibrates. The study involved 8,304 people and 6 different studies, and the results of the study were reliable.
gold: Sin embargo, este efecto beneficioso depende de la inclusión de los datos del clofibrato, un fármaco que se suspendió en 2002 debido a problemas de seguridad.
translated_output: Esta oración se refiere a un estudio que analizó cómo la ingesta de un tipo de medicamento llamado fibratos afecta las posibilidades de sufrir un ataque al corazón. El estudio encontró que tomar fibratos puede ayudar a prevenir un ataque al corazón y que las probabilidades de sufrir un ataque al corazón eran más bajas para las personas que tomaban fibratos. El estudio involucró a 8,304 personas y 6 estudios diferentes, y los resultados del estudio fueron confiables.
old_gold: However, this beneficial effect relies on the inclusion on data from clofibrates, a drug that was discontinued in 2002 because of safety concerns.

input: The results of this review are threatened by both risks of systematic errors (bias) and risks of random errors (play of chance).
output: The findings of this study could be wrong because of two different reasons: 1) problems with the way the study was done, and 2) random mistakes that just happen by chance.
gold: Además, los resultados son propensos a riesgos de errores aleatorios.
translated_output: Los hallazgos de este estudio podrían estar equivocados debido a dos razones diferentes: 1) problemas con la forma en que se realizó el estudio y 2) errores aleatorios que simplemente ocurren por casualidad.
old_gold: Furthermore, our results are prone to risks of random errors.

input: Dietary advice as a control arm had a 100% non-completion rate in one trial (35 participants).
output: In one study, none of the 35 people who were given advice about their diet followed the advice.
gold: La mayoría de las terapias parecen ser tan aceptables como cualquier otro enfoque, excepto el asesoramiento dietético, que presentó una tasa de no respuesta del 100% en un ensayo pequeño.
translated_output: En un estudio, ninguna de las 35 personas que recibieron consejos sobre su dieta siguió el consejo.
old_gold: Most therapies appeared as acceptable as any other approach, except for dietary advice which had a 100% non-completion rate in one small trial.

input: The improved success rate at the first attempt may be more pronounced in infants and small children, in whom arterial line cannulation is more challenging than in older children.
output: The chance of being successful the first time is higher in babies and younger children than in older children when doctors try to put a tube into their artery. This is because it is harder to do in babies and younger children.
gold: Se encontró que la ecografía aumentó la tasa de canulación exitosa al primer intento y redujo la formación de hematomas.
translated_output: La probabilidad de tener éxito la primera vez es mayor en bebés y niños más pequeños que en niños mayores cuando los médicos intentan colocar un tubo en la arteria. Esto se debe a que es más difícil hacerlo en bebés y niños pequeños.
old_gold: We found that ultrasound increased the rate of successful cannulation at the first attempt and reduced the formation of haematomas.

input: We found no clinically meaningful blood pressure-lowering differences between different drugs within the loop diuretic class.
output: We did not find any important differences in how well different drugs from the same group (loop diuretics) lower blood pressure.
gold: Ningún diurético de asa parece ser mejor o peor que otros en cuanto a la capacidad de disminución de la presión arterial.
translated_output: No se encontraron diferencias importantes en la forma en que los diferentes fármacos del mismo grupo (diuréticos de asa) reducen la presión arterial.
old_gold: No loop diuretic drug appears to be any better or worse than others in terms of blood pressure-lowering ability.

input: Whilst such surgery is classed as "clean-contaminated", the usefulness of and the most appropriate regimen for antibiotic prophylaxis in these patients are still debated.
output: Doctors are not sure if taking antibiotics before certain surgeries is a good idea or not. They know the surgeries are not very dangerous, but they still aren't sure if taking antibiotics is the best way to stay safe.
gold: Aunque se ha observado un riesgo de infección después de la cirugía, no se ha alcanzado un acuerdo con respecto a si los antibióticos resultan útiles para la prevención de la infección ni a qué tipo y dosis de antibiótico debe usarse.
translated_output: Los médicos no están seguros de si tomar antibióticos antes de ciertas cirugías es una buena idea o no. Saben que las cirugías no son muy peligrosas, pero aún no están seguros de si tomar antibióticos es la mejor manera de mantenerse a salvo.
old_gold: Whilst a risk of infection following surgery has been noted, no agreement has been reached regarding how useful antibiotics are for infection prevention and what type and dose of antibiotic should be used.

input: Nine trials evaluated the dose-related blood pressure-lowering efficacy of five drugs within the loop diuretics class (furosemide 40 mg to 60 mg, cicletanine 100 mg to 150 mg, piretanide 3 mg to 6 mg, indacrinone enantiomer -2.5 mg to -10.0/+80 mg, and etozolin 200 mg) in 460 people with baseline blood pressure of 162/103 mmHg for a mean duration of 8.8 weeks.
output: This sentence is talking about a study that was done to see how well 5 different medicines could lower blood pressure in 460 people. The medicines were furosemide, cicletanine, piretanide, indacrinone, and etozolin. The study looked at different doses of each medicine and tested it on the people for a period of 8.8 weeks. The people in the study had a blood pressure of 162/103 mmHg at the start.
gold: Se encontraron nueve ensayos que estudiaron la capacidad de disminución de la presión arterial de cinco diuréticos de asa diferentes (furosemida, cicletanina, piretanida, indacrinona y etozolina) en 460 participantes.
translated_output: Esta oración se refiere a un estudio que se realizó para ver qué tan bien 5 medicamentos diferentes podían reducir la presión arterial en 460 personas. Los medicamentos fueron furosemida, cicletanina, piretanida, indacrinona y etozolina. El estudio analizó diferentes dosis de cada medicamento y lo probó en las personas durante un período de 8,8 semanas. Las personas del estudio tenían una presión arterial de 162/103 mmHg al comienzo.
old_gold: We found 9 trials studying the blood pressure-lowering ability of 5 different loop diuretics (furosemide, cicletanine, piretanide, indacrinone and etozolin) in 460 participants.

input: The focus of treatment has moved to an outpatient setting, and a number of differing psychological therapies are presently used in treatment.
output: Doctors are now mostly treating people in outpatient settings. This means that people don't need to stay in a hospital overnight to get help. Different types of psychological therapy are being used to help people.
gold: Las terapias psicológicas son el tratamiento principal y la mayoría de los pacientes reciben tratamiento en contextos ambulatorios.
translated_output: Los médicos ahora tratan principalmente a las personas en entornos ambulatorios. Esto significa que las personas no necesitan pasar la noche en un hospital para recibir ayuda. Se están utilizando diferentes tipos de terapia psicológica para ayudar a las personas.
old_gold: Psychological therapies are the main treatment and most people are treated as outpatients.

input: To assess interventions used in the management of all types of melasma: epidermal, dermal, and mixed.
output: This sentence is asking us to look at different kinds of treatments that are used to help people with melasma, which is a skin condition that causes dark patches on the face. We need to look at what treatments work best for each type of melasma, which includes epidermal, dermal and mixed.
gold: El melasma se divide en tres tipos: melasma epidérmico, dérmico y mixto.
translated_output: Esta oración nos pide que observemos diferentes tipos de tratamientos que se usan para ayudar a las personas con melasma, que es una afección de la piel que causa manchas oscuras en la cara. Necesitamos ver qué tratamientos funcionan mejor para cada tipo de melasma, que incluye epidérmico, dérmico y mixto.
old_gold: Melasma is divided into three types: epidermal, dermal, and mixed melasma.

input: The current review is limited by the small number of available studies with limited numbers of patients enrolled.
output: This sentence means that there are not very many studies that have been done on this topic, and the studies that have been done did not involve a lot of people.
gold: La calidad de la evidencia es limitada por el tamaño de estudio pequeño y el alto riesgo de sesgo.
translated_output: Esta oración significa que no se han realizado muchos estudios sobre este tema, y los estudios que se han realizado no involucraron a mucha gente.
old_gold: The quality of evidence is limited by small study size and high risk of bias.

input: We did not restrict the search and study selection with respect to language, date of publication or study setting.
output: We did not limit our search or decide which studies to use based on what language they were written in, when they were published, or where they took place.
gold: Se recopilaron datos de todos los estudios que consideraban esta pregunta y se resumieron para determinar si los antibióticos podrían prevenir la infección después de la cirugía, si este tratamiento tiene efectos adversos, si reduce el número de días que el paciente debe permanecer en el hospital y si mejora el estado de salud general.
translated_output: No limitamos nuestra búsqueda ni decidimos qué estudios usar en función del idioma en el que se escribieron, cuándo se publicaron o dónde se realizaron.
old_gold: We collected data from all studies addressing this question and summarised them to determine whether antibiotics could prevent infection after surgery, whether this treatment has any adverse effects, whether it reduces the number of days that patients need to be in the hospital and whether it improves overall health status.

input: All studies were assessed as having low or unclear risk of bias for selection bias, detection bias, attrition bias and selective reporting bias.
output: All of the research that was done was checked to make sure that it was fair, and that it was not missing any important information that would change the results.
gold: Debido a la limitada información sobre el diseño de los estudios y al pequeño número de pacientes incluidos, los resultados deben interpretarse con precaución.
translated_output: Toda la investigación que se realizó se verificó para asegurarse de que fuera justa y que no faltara ninguna información importante que pudiera cambiar los resultados.
old_gold: Due to limited information about the design of the studies, and the small number of patients enrolled, the results should be interpreted with caution.

input: The best estimate of systolic/diastolic blood pressure-lowering efficacy of loop diuretics was -7.9 (-10.4 to -5.4) mmHg/ -4.4 (-5.9 to -2.8) mmHg.
output: Loop diuretics are a type of medicine that can help lower your blood pressure. Studies have shown that, on average, these medicines can lower your systolic blood pressure (the top number) by about 8 points and your diastolic blood pressure (the bottom number) by about 4 points.
gold: El efecto de disminución de la presión arterial fue modesto, la presión sistólica disminuyó 8 mmHg y la presión diastólica 4 mmHg.
translated_output: Los diuréticos de asa son un tipo de medicamento que puede ayudar a bajar la presión arterial. Los estudios han demostrado que, en promedio, estos medicamentos pueden reducir su presión arterial sistólica (el número superior) en aproximadamente 8 puntos y su presión arterial diastólica (el número inferior) en aproximadamente 4 puntos.
old_gold: The blood pressure-lowering effect was modest, with systolic pressure lowered by 8 mmHg and diastolic pressure by 4 mmHg.

input: The contraceptive vaginal sponge was developed as an alternative to the contraceptive diaphragm.
output: The contraceptive vaginal sponge is a birth control option that was created as an alternative to the contraceptive diaphragm, which is another type of birth control.
gold: El diafragma también contiene un producto químico para matar los espermatozoides.
translated_output: La esponja vaginal anticonceptiva es una opción anticonceptiva que se creó como alternativa al diafragma anticonceptivo, que es otro tipo de anticonceptivo.
old_gold: The diaphragm also holds a chemical to kill sperm.

input: Although discouraged due to high rates of infectious and thrombotic complications as well as technical issues that limit their life span, CVC have the significant advantage of being immediately usable and are the only means of vascular access in a significant number of patients.
output: Even though CVCs, which are a type of medical device, have a short life span, have a lot of infections and have technical problems, they are still used in some people because they can be used right away.
gold: Lamentablemente, junto con los problemas de infección estas líneas son propensas a la disfunción debido a la coagulación y a la formación de una vaina de fibrina.
translated_output: Aunque los CVC, que son un tipo de dispositivo médico, tienen una vida útil corta, tienen muchas infecciones y tienen problemas técnicos, todavía se usan en algunas personas porque se pueden usar de inmediato.
old_gold: Unfortunately, along with infection issues these lines are prone to dysfunction due to clotting and fibrin sheath formation.

input: We included all studies conducted in people with ESKD who rely on tunnelled CVC for either initiation or maintenance of HD access and who require restoration of catheter patency following late-onset catheter malfunction and evaluated the role of TLA, fibrin sheath stripping or over-the-wire catheter exchange to restore catheter function.
output: We looked at studies done on people with kidney disease who have a tube in their body to help with dialysis and needed help to make sure the tube kept working properly. We wanted to see if cleaning the tube, taking out part of the tube, or replacing the tube would help it work better.
gold: ¿Qué se hizo? Se realizaron búsquedas en el Registro Especializado Cochrane de Riñón y Trasplante hasta el 17 de agosto de 2017 y se realizó una revisión sistemática de los estudios realizados en pacientes con catéteres de hemodiálisis disfuncionales y se comparó el éxito de los agentes trombolíticos, la eliminación de la vaina de fibrina y el reemplazo de la línea. ¿Qué se encontró?
translated_output: Observamos estudios realizados en personas con enfermedad renal que tienen un tubo en el cuerpo para ayudar con la diálisis y necesitaban ayuda para asegurarse de que el tubo siguiera funcionando correctamente. Queríamos ver si limpiar el tubo, sacar parte del tubo o reemplazar el tubo ayudaría a que funcionara mejor.
old_gold: We searched Cochrane Kidney and Transplant's Specialised Register up to 17 August 2017 and performed a systematic review of studies performed in patients with dysfunctional haemodialysis catheters and compared the success of thrombolytic agents, fibrin sheath stripping and line replacement.

input: The ulcers usually arise over a bony prominence, and are recognised as a common medical problem affecting people confined to a bed or wheelchair for long periods of time.
output: Ulcers are sores that often develop on parts of the body that stick out and are a common medical issue for people who have to stay in a bed or wheelchair for a long time.
gold: La falta de movimiento y la presión mantenida sobre la piel que cubre partes óseas del cuerpo como las caderas, los talones, la región lumbar y los codos pueden causar que la piel se rompa y se forme una úlcera.
translated_output: Las úlceras son llagas que a menudo se desarrollan en partes del cuerpo que sobresalen y son un problema médico común para las personas que tienen que permanecer en una cama o silla de ruedas durante mucho tiempo.
old_gold: Lack of movement and sustained pressure on the skin over bony parts of the body such as the hips, heels, lower back and elbows can cause the skin to break down and an ulcer to form.

input: Cardiovascular disease (CVD) is the most frequent cause of death in people with early stages of chronic kidney disease (CKD), for whom the absolute risk of cardiovascular events is similar to people who have existing coronary artery disease.
output: People with early stages of chronic kidney disease are more likely to die from a problem with their heart or blood vessels than from any other cause. In fact, their risk of having a problem with their heart or blood vessels is just as high as people who already have a known heart problem.
gold: Se encontró que las estatinas redujeron el riesgo de muerte y los eventos cardíacos graves en un 20%.
translated_output: Las personas con las primeras etapas de la enfermedad renal crónica tienen más probabilidades de morir por un problema en el corazón o en los vasos sanguíneos que por cualquier otra causa. De hecho, su riesgo de tener un problema con el corazón o los vasos sanguíneos es tan alto como el de las personas que ya tienen un problema cardíaco conocido.
old_gold: We found that statins reduced the risk of death and major heart-related events by 20%.

input: When comparing individual psychological therapies with each other, no specific treatment was consistently superior to any other specific approach.
output: When looking at all the different types of therapy to help people with their mental health, none of them was always better than any other.
gold: Debido al riesgo de sesgo y a las limitaciones de los estudios, especialmente los tamaños de muestra pequeños, no es posible establecer conclusiones específicas acerca de los efectos de las terapias psicológicas individuales específicas para la anorexia nerviosa en adultos o adolescentes mayores. ¿Qué debe suceder a continuación?
translated_output: Al observar todos los diferentes tipos de terapia para ayudar a las personas con su salud mental, ninguno de ellos fue siempre mejor que otro.
old_gold: Because of the risk of bias and limitations of studies, notably small sample sizes, we can draw no specific conclusions about the effects of specific individual psychological therapies for anorexia nervosa in adults or older adolescents.

input: Extracranial internal carotid artery dissection (eICAD) is a leading cause of stroke in younger patients.
output: Extracranial internal carotid artery dissection (eICAD) is a type of stroke that happens most often to younger patients.
gold: Estos coágulos pueden luego obstruir la arteria y provocar un accidente cerebrovascular.
translated_output: La disección de la arteria carótida interna extracraneal (eICAD, por sus siglas en inglés) es un tipo de accidente cerebrovascular que ocurre con mayor frecuencia en pacientes más jóvenes.
old_gold: These blood clots can then block the artery and cause a stroke.

input: Pooled analyses for adverse events suggest lower risk of nausea and vomiting with propofol than with sevoflurane (risk ratio (RR) 0.68, 95% CI 0.51 to 0.91, low-quality evidence) or isoflurane (RR 0.45, 95% CI 0.26 to 0.78) and greater risk of haemodynamic changes with propofol than with sevoflurane (RR 1.85, 95% CI 1.07 to 3.17), but no differences in the risk of shivering or pain.
output: The results of many studies show that propofol is less likely to cause nausea or vomiting than sevoflurane, but is more likely to cause changes in the body's blood pressure than sevoflurane. There is no difference between propofol and sevoflurane when it comes to shivering or pain.
gold: En cuanto a los efectos adversos, el propofol tuvo menores probabilidades de provocar náuseas y vómitos que el anestésico gaseoso (cerca de la mitad de las probabilidades), pero fue más probable que se asociara con cambios en la presión arterial.
translated_output: Los resultados de muchos estudios muestran que es menos probable que el propofol cause náuseas o vómitos que el sevoflurano, pero es más probable que cause cambios en la presión arterial del cuerpo que el sevoflurano. No hay diferencia entre propofol y sevoflurano cuando se trata de escalofríos o dolor.
old_gold: In terms of adverse effects, propofol was less likely to cause nausea and vomiting than either gas anaesthetic (about half as likely) but was more likely to be associated with changes in blood pressure.

input: The quality of the evidence was rated as high.
output: The evidence was judged to be very good.
gold: Se llegó a la conclusión de que hay evidencia de buena calidad acerca de que el uso de las agujas con punta roma reduce de forma significativa el riesgo que tienen los cirujanos y sus asistentes de contraer de enfermedades infecciosas al disminuir el número de lesiones por pinchazo de aguja.
translated_output: La evidencia se consideró muy buena.
old_gold: We concluded that there is high quality evidence that the use of blunt needles appreciably reduces the risk of contracting infectious diseases for surgeons and their assistants over a range of operations by reducing the number of needle stick injuries.

input: Cardiovascular disease (CVD) is the most frequent cause of death in people with early stages of chronic kidney disease (CKD), for whom the absolute risk of cardiovascular events is similar to people who have existing coronary artery disease.
output: People with early stages of chronic kidney disease (CKD) have a high risk of dying from cardiovascular disease (CVD). This risk is the same as people who already have coronary artery disease.
gold: Los adultos con nefropatía crónica (NC) presentan un riesgo alto de desarrollar complicaciones relacionadas con cardiopatías.
translated_output: Las personas con las primeras etapas de la enfermedad renal crónica (ERC) tienen un alto riesgo de morir por enfermedad cardiovascular (ECV). Este riesgo es el mismo que el de las personas que ya tienen enfermedad de las arterias coronarias.
old_gold: Adults with chronic kidney disease (CKD) have high risks of developing complications from heart disease.

input: To evaluate the efficacy of medical and surgical therapies for children with intrinsic (primary) tracheomalacia.
output: To find out how well medical treatments and surgeries work to help children who have a condition called tracheomalacia.
translated_output: Para saber qué tan bien funcionan los tratamientos médicos y las cirugías para ayudar a los niños que tienen una afección llamada traqueomalacia.
old_gold: The word 'primary' refers to tracheomalacia in which the windpipe itself is the cause of the disease, where as secondary tracheomalacia is compressed due to some other abnormality near to the windpipe.

input: Randomised controlled trials (RCTs) of blunt versus sharp suture needles for preventing needle stick injuries among surgical staff measured as glove perforations or self-reported needle stick injuries.
output: Scientists are comparing two types of needles to see which one is better at stopping medical staff from getting hurt. They are measuring how well the needles work by seeing if the gloves that the medical staff wear have been poked or if the medical staff report that they were stuck by a needle.
gold: Los estudios se incluían si eran ensayos controlados aleatorizados (ECA) de agujas de sutura con punta roma versus afiladas para prevenir las lesiones por pinchazo de aguja en el personal quirúrgico.
translated_output: Los científicos están comparando dos tipos de agujas para ver cuál es mejor para evitar que el personal médico se lastime. Están midiendo qué tan bien funcionan las agujas al ver si los guantes que usa el personal médico se han pinchado o si el personal médico informa que se pincharon con una aguja.
old_gold: We included studies if they were randomised controlled trials (RCTs) of blunt versus sharp suture needles for preventing needle stick injuries among surgical staff.

input: The contraceptive vaginal sponge was developed as an alternative to the contraceptive diaphragm.
output: The contraceptive vaginal sponge was created as another way to prevent pregnancy, instead of using the contraceptive diaphragm.
gold: La esponja vaginal es un método anticonceptivo que se utiliza en el canal de parto.
translated_output: La esponja vaginal anticonceptiva fue creada como otra forma de prevenir el embarazo, en lugar de utilizar el diafragma anticonceptivo.
old_gold: The vaginal sponge is a birth control method used in the birth canal.

input: We included all randomised clinical trials comparing box model trainers versus no training in surgical trainees with no prior laparoscopic experience.
output: We studied different types of surgical training to find out if it was helpful for people who had never done laparoscopic surgery before. We looked at people who used a type of practice called box model training and people who did not use any training.
gold: Los ensayos compararon el entrenamiento con simulador versus ningún entrenamiento (16 ensayos; 464 participantes) o versus diferentes tipos de entrenamiento con simulador (14 ensayos; 382 participantes) (algunos ensayos y participantes se incluyeron en ambas comparaciones debido a que los ensayos comparaban diferentes métodos de entrenamiento con simulador versus ningún entrenamiento).
translated_output: Estudiamos diferentes tipos de capacitación quirúrgica para averiguar si era útil para las personas que nunca antes habían realizado una cirugía laparoscópica. Observamos a personas que usaron un tipo de práctica llamada entrenamiento de modelo de caja y personas que no usaron ningún entrenamiento.
old_gold: The trials compared box model training versus no training (16 trials; 464 participants) or versus different types of box model training (14 trials; 382 participants) (some trials and participants were included in both comparisons as the trials compared different methods of box training versus no training).

input: Similarly, discontinuation rates at 12 months were higher with the sponge than with the diaphragm (Odds ratio 1.31; 95% CI 1.07 to 1.59).
output: At the end of 12 months, more people stopped using the sponge as a form of birth control than the diaphragm. The odds of stopping using the sponge were 1.31 times higher than the odds of stopping using the diaphragm.
gold: Aproximadamente un 30% más de mujeres dejaron de usar la esponja que el diafragma.
translated_output: Al final de los 12 meses, más personas dejaron de usar la esponja como forma de control de la natalidad que el diafragma. Las probabilidades de dejar de usar la esponja fueron 1,31 veces mayores que las probabilidades de dejar de usar el diafragma.
old_gold: About 30% more women stopped using the sponge than the diaphragm.

input: Meta-analysis showed that ultrasound guidance produces superior success rates at first attempt (risk ratio (RR) 1.96, 95% confidence interval (CI) 1.34 to 2.85, 404 catheters, four RCTs, moderate-quality evidence) and fewer complications, such as haematoma formation (RR 0.20, 95% CI 0.07 to 0.60, 222 catheters, two RCTs, moderate-quality evidence).
output: The study found that when doctors use ultrasound to help guide them, they are more likely to get it right the first time (almost two times more likely) and cause less harm (five times less likely) than without ultrasound.
gold: Se encontró que la ecografía aumentó la tasa de canulación exitosa al primer intento y redujo la formación de hematomas.
translated_output: El estudio encontró que cuando los médicos usan el ultrasonido como guía, es más probable que lo hagan bien la primera vez (casi dos veces más probable) y causen menos daño (cinco veces menos probable) que sin ultrasonido.
old_gold: We found that ultrasound increased the rate of successful cannulation at the first attempt and reduced the formation of haematomas.

input: We identified 13 small trials (1520 participants randomised) and three ongoing trials.
output: We studied 13 different experiments that involved 1520 people. We also studied three other experiments that are still going on.
gold: Se encontraron 13 ensayos; ninguno fue suficientemente grande o tuvo una duración suficiente para examinar los efectos del tai chi sobre la reducción de las muertes cardiovasculares o las variables de evaluación no mortales.
translated_output: Estudiamos 13 experimentos diferentes que involucraron a 1520 personas. También estudiamos otros tres experimentos que todavía están en marcha.
old_gold: We found 13 trials, none of them were large enough or of long enough duration to examine the effects of tai chi on reducing cardiovascular deaths or non-fatal endpoints.

input: Anabolic steroids are used as off-label drugs (drugs which are used without regulatory approval) and have been used as adjuvants to usual treatment with dressings, debridement, nutritional supplements, systemic antibiotics and antiseptics, which are considered to be supportive in healing of pressure ulcers.
output: Anabolic steroids are medicines that are not approved by the government but are sometimes used to help heal pressure ulcers. They are used along with other treatments like changing bandages, giving nutritional supplements, giving antibiotics, and using antiseptics. These are all used to help the pressure ulcer heal.
gold: Habitualmente, hay diversos tratamientos que se utilizan para las úlceras por presión, que incluyen vendajes de la herida y camas y colchones especialmente diseñados para reducir la presión sobre ciertas áreas del cuerpo.
translated_output: Los esteroides anabólicos son medicamentos que no están aprobados por el gobierno, pero que a veces se usan para ayudar a curar las úlceras por presión. Se usan junto con otros tratamientos como cambiar vendajes, dar suplementos nutricionales, dar antibióticos y usar antisépticos. Todos estos se utilizan para ayudar a sanar la úlcera por presión.
old_gold: There are a variety of treatments that are usually used for pressure ulcers including wound dressings and specially-designed beds and cushions to reduce pressure on certain areas of the body.

input: In March 2017 we searched the Cochrane Wounds Specialised Register; the Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials (CENTRAL); Ovid MEDLINE (including In-Process & Other Non-Indexed Citations); Ovid Embase and EBSCO CINAHL Plus.
output: In March 2017, we looked up information in several different databases. We looked in the Cochrane Wounds Specialised Register, the Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials, Ovid MEDLINE, Ovid Embase, and EBSCO CINAHL Plus.
gold: Este resumen en términos sencillos está actualizado hasta marzo 2017.
translated_output: En marzo de 2017, buscamos información en varias bases de datos diferentes. Buscamos en el Registro Especializado Cochrane de Heridas, el Registro Central Cochrane de Ensayos Controlados, Ovid MEDLINE, Ovid Embase y EBSCO CINAHL Plus.
old_gold: This plain language summary is up to date as of March 2017.

input: We included three trials (involving 371 participants) in the analysis of the effects of RIC on ischaemic stroke prevention.
output: We looked at the effects of RIC on preventing strokes by running experiments with 371 people. We used the results of these experiments to help us understand the effects of RIC.
gold: Tres ensayos (que incluyeron 371 pacientes) fueron elegibles para el análisis del CIR para la prevención del accidente cerebrovascular isquémico, y otros cuatro ensayos (que incluyeron 364 pacientes) fueron elegibles para el análisis del CIR para el tratamiento del accidente cerebrovascular isquémico.
translated_output: Observamos los efectos de RIC en la prevención de accidentes cerebrovasculares realizando experimentos con 371 personas. Usamos los resultados de estos experimentos para ayudarnos a comprender los efectos de RIC.
old_gold: Three trials (involving 371 people) were eligible for our analysis of RIC for preventing ischaemic stroke, and another four trials (involving 364 people) were eligible for our analysis of RIC for treating ischaemic stroke.

input: Oral morphine in either immediate release or modified release form remains the analgesic of choice for moderate or severe cancer pain.
output: Morphine is the best medicine for relieving pain caused by cancer. It can be taken by mouth and comes in two forms: one that works right away and another that works over a longer period of time.
gold: La morfina administrada por vía oral produjo un buen alivio del dolor para la mayoría de los pacientes con dolor por cáncer moderado o intenso.
translated_output: La morfina es la mejor medicina para aliviar el dolor causado por el cáncer. Se puede tomar por vía oral y viene en dos formas: una que funciona de inmediato y otra que funciona durante un período de tiempo más prolongado.
old_gold: Morphine taken by mouth produced good pain relief for most people with moderate or severe cancer pain.

input: The focus of treatment has moved to an outpatient setting, and a number of differing psychological therapies are presently used in treatment.
output: Many people who need help with psychological problems are now being treated in places outside of the hospital. There are different kinds of therapies that are used to help people with these problems.
gold: Se utilizan diferentes tipos de terapias, desde las dinámicas (en las que se exploran los problemas del pasado) hasta terapias cognitivo-conductuales muy directivas (en las que se dan consejos específicos y se le exige a los pacientes que mantengan un registro de su comportamiento alimentario).
translated_output: Muchas personas que necesitan ayuda con problemas psicológicos ahora están siendo tratadas en lugares fuera del hospital. Existen diferentes tipos de terapias que se utilizan para ayudar a las personas con estos problemas.
old_gold: A number of different types of therapy are used, from dynamic (where past issues are explored) to very directive cognitive-behavioural therapies (where specific advice is given and people are required to keep records of their eating behaviour).

input: Insufficient power was problematic for the majority of trials.
output: There wasn't enough power to make the trials successful for most of the time.
gold: Debido al riesgo de sesgo y a las limitaciones de los estudios, especialmente los tamaños de muestra pequeños, no es posible establecer conclusiones específicas acerca de los efectos de las terapias psicológicas individuales específicas para la anorexia nerviosa en adultos o adolescentes mayores. ¿Qué debe suceder a continuación?
translated_output: No había suficiente potencia para que las pruebas fueran exitosas la mayor parte del tiempo.
old_gold: Because of the risk of bias and limitations of studies, notably small sample sizes, we can draw no specific conclusions about the effects of specific individual psychological therapies for anorexia nervosa in adults or older adolescents.

input: In people with carotid stenosis undergoing carotid stenting, there was no significant difference in the incidence of ischaemic stroke between participants treated with RIC and non-RIC (RR 0.22, 95% CI 0.01 to 4.03; 1 trial, 189 participants, low-quality evidence); however the stroke severity (assessed by infarct volume) was significantly lower in participants treated with RIC (mean difference (MD) -0.17 mL, 95% CI -0.23 to -0.11; 1 trial, 189 participants, low-quality evidence).
output: People with carotid stenosis (a narrowed artery in the neck) had a medical procedure called carotid stenting. In this procedure, some people received a special treatment called RIC (Remote Ischemic Conditioning). The study showed that there was no big difference in the number of people who had a stroke after the procedure between those who received RIC and those who did not. However, the study did show that people who received RIC had less severe strokes than those who did not receive RIC.
gold: En los pacientes que reciben tratamiento de colocación de un stent (inserción de un tubo metálico o plástico) por el estrechamiento de las arterias del cuello, el CIR puede reducir el tamaño de las nuevas lesiones cerebrales causadas por la reducción del flujo sanguíneo.
translated_output: Las personas con estenosis carotídea (una arteria estrechada en el cuello) se sometieron a un procedimiento médico llamado colocación de stent carotídeo. En este procedimiento, algunas personas recibieron un tratamiento especial llamado RIC (Remote Ischemic Conditioning). El estudio mostró que no hubo una gran diferencia en la cantidad de personas que sufrieron un accidente cerebrovascular después del procedimiento entre las que recibieron RIC y las que no.
