output: Anabolic steroids are medications that are used for reasons other than what they were originally made for. Doctors sometimes use them to help heal pressure ulcers by using dressings, cleaning out the wound, giving nutritional supplements, antibiotics, and antiseptics.
gold: Se pueden utilizar como una alternativa, o un complemento, a los tratamientos convencionales para las úlceras por presión.
translated_output: Los esteroides anabólicos son medicamentos que se usan por razones distintas a las que se fabricaron originalmente. Los médicos a veces los usan para ayudar a sanar las úlceras por presión usando apósitos, limpiando la herida, administrando suplementos nutricionales, antibióticos y antisépticos.
old_gold: They can be used as an alternative to, or alongside, conventional treatments for pressure ulcers.

input: To compare, among patients treated with either anticoagulants or antiplatelet agents, the risk of ischaemic strokes and major bleeding episodes.
output: This sentence is talking about two different kinds of medicine. It is comparing how likely it is for people taking each kind of medicine to have a stroke caused by a lack of blood flow to the brain, or to have a major bleeding episode.
gold: No se comprobó que los anticoagulantes fueran más efectivos que la aspirina.
translated_output: Esta oración habla de dos tipos diferentes de medicina. Compara la probabilidad de que las personas que toman cada tipo de medicamento sufran un accidente cerebrovascular causado por la falta de flujo sanguíneo al cerebro o que tengan un episodio de sangrado importante.
old_gold: There was no evidence that anticoagulants were better than aspirin.

input: We searched the following electronic databases: the Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials (CENTRAL) (Issue 11, 2013); MEDLINE (Ovid) (1946 to November week 3, 2013); EMBASE Classic + EMBASE (Ovid) (1947 to 6 December 2013); Web of Science (Thomson Reuters) (1970 to 6 December 2013); PsycINFO (Ovid) (1806 to December week 1, 2013); Database of Abstracts of Reviews of Effects (DARE); Health Technology Assessment Database and Health Economics Evaluations Database (Issue 4, 2013).
output: We looked in different databases on the computer for information about topics related to health. The information was from 1946 to 2013.
gold: En las bases de datos científicas se buscaron los ensayos controlados aleatorios (ensayos clínicos que asignaron al azar a los pacientes a uno de dos o más tratamientos) que consideraron los efectos del tai chi sobre los adultos con alto riesgo de desarrollar EC.
translated_output: Buscamos en diferentes bases de datos en la computadora información sobre temas relacionados con la salud. La información fue de 1946 a 2013.
old_gold: We searched scientific databases for randomised controlled trials (clinical trials where people are allocated at random to one of two or more treatments) looking at the effects of tai chi on adults at high risk of developing CVD.

input: Allergic-type reactions were more common with the sponge, although discontinuation for discomfort differed in the two trials.
output: People who were allergic to the sponge had more reactions to it than people who weren't allergic, but some people stopped using the sponge because it made them uncomfortable in both trials.
gold: Sin embargo, la incomodidad hizo que casi el mismo número de mujeres dejara de utilizar su método anticonceptivo.
translated_output: Las personas que eran alérgicas a la esponja tuvieron más reacciones que las personas que no eran alérgicas, pero algunas personas dejaron de usar la esponja porque se sentían incómodas en ambos ensayos.
old_gold: However, discomfort caused about the same numbers of women to stop using their birth control method.

input: In IVF procedures, oocytes and sperm are routinely co-incubated overnight, which may expose oocytes and zygotes to suboptimal culture conditions with increased reactive oxygen species (ROS) produced by sperm in this long term culture.
output: In IVF procedures, eggs and sperm are kept together in the same place for a long time, which can cause the eggs and the early stages of the baby to be exposed to bad things like too much oxygen. This can be dangerous for the baby.
gold: El acortamiento del tiempo de coincubación de los ovocitos y los espermatozoides pudiera mejorar los resultados de la FIV al reducir el efecto perjudicial de las EOR sobre los cigotos y la calidad de los embriones.
translated_output: En los procedimientos de FIV, los óvulos y los espermatozoides se mantienen juntos en el mismo lugar durante mucho tiempo, lo que puede causar que los óvulos y las primeras etapas del bebé estén expuestos a cosas malas como demasiado oxígeno. Esto puede ser peligroso para el bebé.
old_gold: Shortening the co-incubation time of oocytes and sperm may possibly improve IVF outcomes by reducing the detrimental effect of ROS on the zygotes and the quality of the embryos.

input: Future trials should include outcomes such as complications, serious adverse events, quality of life, and pain.
output: In the future, people doing experiments should look at what happens during and after the experiment, such as if there were any problems, how much it affected people's lives, and how much it hurt.
gold: Por lo tanto, se necesitan urgentemente futuros ensayos bien diseñados que examinen las complicaciones, los daños, la calidad de vida y el dolor.
translated_output: En el futuro, las personas que realicen experimentos deberían observar lo que sucede durante y después del experimento, por ejemplo, si hubo algún problema, cuánto afectó la vida de las personas y cuánto dolió.
old_gold: Thus, future well-designed trials examining complications, harms, quality of life, and pain are urgently needed.

input: In people with acute ischaemic stroke, there was no significant difference between RIC and non-RIC for reducing stroke severity as assessed by the National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale score and the final infarct volume (standardised mean difference (SMD) -0.24 mL, 95% CI -1.02 to 0.54; 2 trials, 175 participants, very low quality evidence).
output: In people who have had a stroke, there is no big difference between using a certain type of treatment (RIC) and not using it when it comes to reducing how bad the stroke is or how big the area affected by it (as measured by the National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale score and the final infarct volume).
gold: No se encontraron diferencias significativas en el tamaño del accidente cerebrovascular final.
translated_output: En las personas que han tenido un derrame cerebral, no hay una gran diferencia entre usar cierto tipo de tratamiento (RIC) y no usarlo cuando se trata de reducir la gravedad del derrame cerebral o el tamaño del área afectada por él (medido por el puntuación de la escala de accidentes cerebrovasculares de los Institutos Nacionales de la Salud y el volumen final del infarto).
old_gold: We found no significant differences in the size of the final stroke.

input: The rates were 24.5 for the sponge and 10.9 for the diaphragm in the UK trial.
output: In a study done in the UK, it cost 24.5 pounds to buy a sponge and 10.9 pounds to buy a diaphragm.
gold: De las usuarias del diafragma, 11 quedaron embarazadas.
translated_output: En un estudio realizado en el Reino Unido, costó 24,5 libras comprar una esponja y 10,9 libras comprar un diafragma.
old_gold: Of the diaphragm users, 11 became pregnant.

input: It is unlikely that future research will change this conclusion.
output: It is unlikely that any new studies or experiments will show a different result than what we have now.
gold: Es poco probable que las investigaciones futuras cambien esta conclusión.
translated_output: Es poco probable que nuevos estudios o experimentos muestren un resultado diferente al que tenemos ahora.
old_gold: It is unlikely that future research will change this conclusion.

input: We analysed the effects of RIC on preventing and treating ischaemic stroke respectively.
output: We studied how RIC can help to stop and treat ischemic stroke.
gold: Los estudios han indicado que el CIR puede tener efectos beneficiosos en la prevención y el tratamiento del accidente cerebrovascular isquémico.
translated_output: Estudiamos cómo RIC puede ayudar a detener y tratar el accidente cerebrovascular isquémico.
old_gold: Studies have suggested that RIC may have beneficial effects for preventing and treating ischaemic stroke.

input: We searched the Cochrane Central Register of Controlled Trials (CENTRAL) (the Cochrane Library, 2016, Issue 9), Ovid MEDLINE (1950 to September 2016), Ovid Embase (1974 to September 2016), Science Citation Index Expanded (1970 to September 2016), Chinese Biomedical Literature Database (CBM) (1978 to September 2016), ClinicalTrials.gov (September 2016), and World Health Organization International Clinical Trials Registry Platform (September 2016).
output: We looked for information in many different places, including the Cochrane Library, Ovid MEDLINE, Ovid Embase, Science Citation Index Expanded, Chinese Biomedical Literature Database, ClinicalTrials.gov and the World Health Organization International Clinical Trials Registry Platform. All of these sources had information from 1950 to September 2016.
gold: Se buscaron todos los estudios relevantes hasta septiembre de 2016.
translated_output: Buscamos información en muchos lugares diferentes, incluida la Biblioteca Cochrane, Ovid MEDLINE, Ovid Embase, Science Citation Index Expanded, Chinese Biomedical Literature Database, ClinicalTrials.gov y la Plataforma de Registro Internacional de Ensayos Clínicos de la Organización Mundial de la Salud. Todas estas fuentes tenían información desde 1950 hasta septiembre de 2016.
old_gold: We searched for all relevant studies up to September 2016.

input: Interventions included: thrombolytic therapy versus placebo (1 study); low versus high dose thrombolytic therapy (1); alteplase versus urokinase (1); short versus long thrombolytic dwell (1); thrombolytic therapy versus percutaneous fibrin sheath stripping (1); fibrin sheath stripping versus over-the-wire catheter exchange (1); and over-the-wire catheter exchange versus exchange with and without angioplasty sheath disruption (1).
output: This sentence is talking about different treatments for a medical condition. It lists seven different treatments, and then explains what each treatment is comparing. For example, the first treatment compares thrombolytic therapy (a type of medicine) with a placebo (a fake medicine). The second treatment compares a low dose of thrombolytic therapy with a high dose of it. The third treatment compares two different medicines, alteplase and urokinase. The fourth treatment compares a short treatment with a long one. The fifth treatment compares thrombolytic therapy with a procedure to remove a fibrin sheath. The sixth treatment compares a procedure to remove a fibrin sheath with a procedure to exchange a catheter. The seventh treatment compares a procedure to exchange a catheter with or without a procedure to widen a blood vessel.
gold: Los estudios también compararon las dosis del fármaco y los métodos de administración.
translated_output: Esta oración habla de diferentes tratamientos para una condición médica. Enumera siete tratamientos diferentes y luego explica qué está comparando cada tratamiento. Por ejemplo, el primer tratamiento compara la terapia trombolítica (un tipo de medicamento) con un placebo (un medicamento falso). El segundo tratamiento compara una dosis baja de terapia trombolítica con una dosis alta de la misma. El tercer tratamiento compara dos medicamentos diferentes, alteplasa y uroquinasa. El cuarto tratamiento compara un tratamiento corto con uno largo. El quinto tratamiento compara la terapia trombolítica con un procedimiento para retirar una vaina de fibrina. El sexto tratamiento compara un procedimiento para retirar una vaina de fibrina con un procedimiento para cambiar un catéter. El séptimo tratamiento compara un procedimiento para cambiar un catéter con o sin un procedimiento para ensanchar un vaso sanguíneo.
old_gold: Studies also compared drug dosages and methods of administration.

input: A total of 11 trials were included in this review.
output: This review looked at 11 different experiments.
gold: Se encontraron 11 estudios.
translated_output: Esta revisión analizó 11 experimentos diferentes.
old_gold: We found 11 studies.

input: Modified release versions of morphine were effective for 12- or 24-hour dosing depending on the formulation.
output: Morphine is a medicine that can be taken in a special form that helps people feel better for 12 or 24 hours depending on how it is made.
gold: Hay comprimidos de liberación modificada que liberan morfina más lentamente, para que puedan administrarse solo dos veces al día o incluso una.
translated_output: La morfina es un medicamento que se puede tomar en una forma especial que ayuda a las personas a sentirse mejor durante 12 o 24 horas, según cómo se elabore.
old_gold: Modified release tablets are available that release morphine more slowly, so that they can be taken only twice a day or even only once a day.

input: For the initial review, we searched the reference lists of relevant articles and book chapters.
output: For the first look, we looked through the lists of books and articles that are related to the topic.
gold: Para la revisión original, se consultaron las listas de referencias y los capítulos de libros para encontrar ensayos.
translated_output: Para el primer vistazo, revisamos las listas de libros y artículos relacionados con el tema.
old_gold: For the original review, we looked at reference lists and book chapters to find trials.

input: Cardiovascular disease (CVD) is the most frequent cause of death in people with early stages of chronic kidney disease (CKD), for whom the absolute risk of cardiovascular events is similar to people who have existing coronary artery disease.
output: People with early stages of chronic kidney disease have a high risk of getting a cardiovascular disease, which is a common cause of death. The risk of having a heart-related problem is the same for people with chronic kidney disease as it is for people who already have a heart problem.
gold: Las estatinas presentan algunos efectos perjudiciales potenciales sobre la función hepática y muscular y algunos tipos de cáncer.
translated_output: Las personas con las primeras etapas de la enfermedad renal crónica tienen un alto riesgo de contraer una enfermedad cardiovascular, que es una causa común de muerte. El riesgo de tener un problema relacionado con el corazón es el mismo para las personas con enfermedad renal crónica que para las personas que ya tienen un problema cardíaco.
old_gold: Statins have some potential harmful effects on liver and muscle function, and some cancers.

input: Smoking prevalence in Indigenous youth is twice that of the non-Indigenous population, with tobacco experimentation commencing at an early age.
output: Indigenous (Native American) young people smoke twice as much as people who are not Native American, and they start trying cigarettes at a very young age.
gold: Los jóvenes permanecen en riesgo de comenzar a fumar.
translated_output: Los jóvenes indígenas (nativos americanos) fuman el doble que las personas que no son nativos americanos, y empiezan a probar los cigarrillos a una edad muy temprana.
old_gold: Young people remain at particular risk of taking up smoking.

input: A malaria vaccine is needed because of the heavy burden of mortality and morbidity due to this disease.
output: A malaria vaccine is important because many people die and get sick from it.
gold: El paludismo grave causa pérdida de la consciencia y muerte.
translated_output: Una vacuna contra la malaria es importante porque muchas personas mueren y se enferman a causa de ella.
old_gold: Severe malaria causes unconsciousness and death.

input: In two studies where tretinoin was compared to placebo, participants rated their melasma as significantly improved in one (RR 13, 95% CI 1.88 to 89.74) but not the other.
output: In two different studies, people used a cream called tretinoin and compared it to a cream with no special ingredients in it. Most people said their problem with melasma got better when they used the tretinoin cream in one of the studies, but not in the other one.
gold: La tretinoina fue más eficaz para aclarar el melasma comparada con placebo, al igual que el complejo blanqueador de la piel Thiospot.
translated_output: En dos estudios diferentes, las personas usaron una crema llamada tretinoína y la compararon con una crema sin ingredientes especiales. La mayoría de las personas dijeron que su problema con el melasma mejoró cuando usaron la crema de tretinoína en uno de los estudios, pero no en el otro.
old_gold: Tretinoin was more effective at lightening melasma compared to placebo, as was the skin-whitening complex Thiospot.

input: Thrombolysis, fibrin sheath disruption and over-the-wire catheter exchange are effective and appropriate therapies for immediately restoring catheter patency in dysfunctional cuffed and tunnelled HD catheters.
output: Thrombolysis, fibrin sheath disruption, and over-the-wire catheter exchange are ways of fixing a catheter that is not working properly and making it work again quickly.
gold: La alteración física de una vaina de fibrina puede tener la misma efectividad que el agente trombolítico farmacéutico para el tratamiento inmediato de la disfunción del catéter.
translated_output: La trombólisis, la ruptura de la vaina de fibrina y el intercambio de catéteres por cable son formas de reparar un catéter que no funciona correctamente y hacer que vuelva a funcionar rápidamente.
old_gold: Physical disruption of a fibrin sheath may be equally effective as pharmaceutical thrombolytic agent for immediate management of catheter dysfunction.

input: High-quality randomised controlled trials on well-defined participants with long-term outcomes to determine the duration of response are needed.
output: We need to do experiments with a lot of people that have been carefully chosen, and follow up with them over a long time to find out how long the effects of something will last.
gold: Por ejemplo, los estudios deben tener un período de seguimiento mínimo de seis meses y categorizar con claridad los grupos participantes, por ejemplo en cuanto a la edad, el tipo de melasma y la duración de la afección al comienzo del ensayo, para poder considerar estas diferencias cuando se evalúan los resultados.
translated_output: Necesitamos hacer experimentos con muchas personas cuidadosamente seleccionadas y hacer un seguimiento durante mucho tiempo para averiguar cuánto durarán los efectos de algo.
old_gold: For example, studies should have a minimum follow-up period of 6 months and should clearly categorise participant groups such as age, type of melasma, and duration of the condition at the start of the trial so that these differences can be considered when assessing results.

input: There is insufficient evidence to suggest any specific intervention is superior in terms of ensuring either dialysis adequacy or reduced risk of adverse events.
output: There is not enough information to show which treatment is the best for making sure dialysis works well and to help prevent bad things from happening.
gold: Actualmente hay evidencia insuficiente a favor de cualquier técnica en cuanto a la adecuación de la diálisis o el riesgo reducido de eventos adversos.
translated_output: No hay suficiente información para mostrar qué tratamiento es el mejor para asegurarse de que la diálisis funcione bien y ayudar a prevenir que sucedan cosas malas.
old_gold: There is currently insufficient evidence favouring any technique in terms of either dialysis adequacy or reduced risk of adverse events.

input: Pooled analyses for brain relaxation suggest lower risk of tense brain with propofol than with isoflurane (RR 0.88, 95% CI 0.67 to 1.17, low-quality evidence), but no difference when propofol is compared with sevoflurane.
output: Research suggests that if you use the medicine propofol to relax your brain, it might be safer than using a different medicine called isoflurane. The research found that the risk of having a tense brain was lower with propofol than with isoflurane. However, there was no difference when propofol was compared with a third medicine called sevoflurane.
gold: En general, se encontró que el isoflurano se asocia con un despertar más lento, pero no se encontró evidencia de diferencias importantes entre el sevoflurano y el propofol.
translated_output: Las investigaciones sugieren que si usa el medicamento propofol para relajar el cerebro, podría ser más seguro que usar un medicamento diferente llamado isoflurano. La investigación encontró que el riesgo de tener un cerebro tenso era menor con propofol que con isoflurano. Sin embargo, no hubo diferencia cuando se comparó el propofol con un tercer medicamento llamado sevoflurano.
old_gold: Overall, we found that isoflurane is associated with slower awakening, but we have found no evidence of important differences between sevoflurane and propofol.

input: Larger RCTs of longer treatment duration and follow-up are needed.
output: We need to do more research to see how effective treatments are in larger groups of people over a longer period of time, and also to see how people are doing after the treatments have ended.
gold: Se necesitan más ensayos controlados aleatorizados multicéntricos grandes de terapias psicológicas de uso frecuente en adolescentes mayores y adultos con anorexia nerviosa.
translated_output: Necesitamos investigar más para ver qué tan efectivos son los tratamientos en grupos más grandes de personas durante un período de tiempo más largo, y también para ver cómo les va a las personas después de que los tratamientos han terminado.
old_gold: We need more large multicentre randomised controlled trials of commonly-used psychological therapies in older adolescents and adults with anorexia nervosa.

input: Most trials recruited fewer than 100 participants and did not provide appropriate data for meta-analysis.
output: Many studies did not have enough people involved, and the information they collected was not good enough to use for a special type of research.
gold: Los estudios a menudo fueron pequeños, compararon muchos preparados diferentes y usaron diferentes diseños de estudio.
translated_output: Muchos estudios no involucraron a suficientes personas y la información que recolectaron no fue lo suficientemente buena para usarla en un tipo especial de investigación.
old_gold: The studies were often small, compared many different preparations, and used different study designs.

input: The review also shows the wide range of study designs, and inconsistency in cross-over designs.
output: The review looked at many different types of studies and found that the cross-over designs varied a lot.
gold: Los estudios a menudo fueron pequeños, compararon muchos preparados diferentes y usaron diferentes diseños de estudio.
translated_output: La revisión analizó muchos tipos diferentes de estudios y encontró que los diseños cruzados variaban mucho.
old_gold: The studies were often small, compared many different preparations, and used different study designs.

input: Most of the studies included in this review were judged to have a high risk of bias and were potentially influenced by pharmaceutical industry involvement.
output: Many of the research studies that were looked at in this review had a lot of problems and it was possible that the drug companies had something to do with them.
gold: La calidad de la evidencia es limitada por el tamaño de estudio pequeño y el alto riesgo de sesgo.
translated_output: Muchos de los estudios de investigación que se analizaron en esta revisión tenían muchos problemas y era posible que las compañías farmacéuticas tuvieran algo que ver con ellos.
old_gold: The quality of evidence is limited by small study size and high risk of bias.

input: Stress and a sedentary lifestyle are major determinants of cardiovascular disease (CVD).
output: Having a lot of stress and not exercising can lead to heart disease.
gold: Sin embargo, se considera que el riesgo de EC puede disminuir al cambiar varios comportamientos modificables que incluyen aumentar los niveles de ejercicios así como la relajación para reducir los niveles de estrés, y ambos están incluidos en el tai chi.
translated_output: Tener mucho estrés y no hacer ejercicio puede provocar enfermedades del corazón.
old_gold: However, it is thought that CVD risk can be lowered by changing a number of modifiable behaviours including increasing levels of exercise, and relaxation to reduce stress levels, and both of these comprise tai chi.

input: In both studies by other objective measures tretinoin treatment significantly reduced the severity of melasma.
output: In two different studies, scientists used tools to measure things objectively, and they found that when people used a medicine called tretinoin, it made their melasma (a skin condition) less severe.
gold: La crema de combinación triple fue significativamente más eficaz para aclarar el melasma comparada con la hidroquinona sola o con las combinaciones duales como la tretinoina y la hidroquinona, la tretinoina y el acetónido de fluocinolona, o la hidroquinona y el acetónido de fluocinolona.
translated_output: En dos estudios diferentes, los científicos usaron herramientas para medir las cosas de manera objetiva y descubrieron que cuando las personas usaban un medicamento llamado tretinoína, su melasma (una afección de la piel) era menos grave.
old_gold: Triple-combination cream was significantly more effective at lightening melasma when compared to hydroquinone alone or to dual combinations such as tretinoin and hydroquinone, tretinoin and fluocinolone acetonide, or hydroquinone and fluocinolone acetonide.

input: This could be due to the agent used or perhaps due to the fact that this is a much older study than the other two studies included in this analysis.
output: It is possible that the results of this study are different from the other two studies because of the type of agent used or because this study is much older than the other two studies.
gold: La curación en el momento del seguimiento a corto plazo fue similar entre los grupos; sin embargo, hay dudas significativas en cuanto a este resultado que pueden ser consecuencia de la antigüedad de uno de los estudios y del agente diferente utilizado en comparación con los otros estudios.
translated_output: Es posible que los resultados de este estudio sean diferentes de los otros dos estudios debido al tipo de agente utilizado o porque este estudio es mucho más antiguo que los otros dos estudios.
old_gold: Cure at short-term follow-up was similar between the groups, however there is significant uncertainty in this result which may be as a result of the age of one of the studies and the different agent used compared to the other studies.

input: There was no significant difference between RIC and non-RIC for improving the psychological impairment (SMD -0.37 points, 95% CI -1.15 to 0.41; 1 trial, 26 participants, very low quality evidence) and the cognitive impairment (SMD -0.26 points; 95% CI -0.72 to 0.21; 3 trials, 79 participants, low-quality evidence) in people with acute ischaemic stroke and cerebral small vessel disease.
output: This sentence is talking about two different groups of people who had strokes: those who received a type of treatment called RIC (RIC stands for Rehabilitation Intervention in Cerebrovascular Disease) and those who did not. It is talking about how the treatment affected their psychological and cognitive health. The results showed that there was not much difference between the two groups in terms of improving the psychological and cognitive health of the people with strokes.
gold: En los pacientes con accidente cerebrovascular isquémico agudo y enfermedad crónica de los vasos sanguíneos del cerebro, el CIR no afectó las medidas de la función nerviosa, el estado de ánimo o la capacidad de pensamiento.
translated_output: Esta oración habla de dos grupos diferentes de personas que sufrieron accidentes cerebrovasculares: los que recibieron un tipo de tratamiento llamado RIC (RIC significa Intervención de rehabilitación en enfermedades cerebrovasculares) y los que no. Se trata de cómo el tratamiento afectó su salud psicológica y cognitiva. Los resultados mostraron que no hubo mucha diferencia entre los dos grupos en términos de mejorar la salud psicológica y cognitiva de las personas con accidentes cerebrovasculares.
old_gold: In people with acute ischaemic stroke and chronic blood vessel disease of the brain, RIC did not affect measures of nerve function, mood, or thinking ability.

input: Such trials should assess the impacts of box model training on surgical skills in both the short and long term, as well as clinical outcomes when the trainee becomes competent to operate on patients.
output: This sentence is talking about experiments that measure how well someone learns to do surgery. The experiments should measure how well the person learns in the short term (right away) and in the long term (over a longer period of time). The experiments should also measure how well the person can do surgery on people when they become good at it.
gold: Los resultados primarios investigados en esta revisión fueron el tiempo hasta realizar la tarea, la puntuación del error, la puntuación de la exactitud y una puntuación compuesta (total sumado) del rendimiento.
translated_output: Esta oración habla de experimentos que miden qué tan bien alguien aprende a hacer cirugía. Los experimentos deben medir qué tan bien aprende la persona a corto plazo (inmediatamente) y a largo plazo (durante un período de tiempo más largo). Los experimentos también deben medir qué tan bien la persona puede hacer cirugía en otras personas cuando se vuelven buenos en eso.
old_gold: The primary outcomes investigated in this review were time taken to perform task, error score, accuracy score, and a composite (total summed) performance score.

input: Laparoscopic surgery is now widely performed to treat various abdominal diseases.
output: Laparoscopic surgery is a type of operation doctors do to help treat diseases in the belly. It is a very common way of doing surgery now.
gold: Actualmente la cirugía laparoscópica se realiza ampliamente para tratar diversas enfermedades abdominales.
translated_output: La cirugía laparoscópica es un tipo de operación que realizan los médicos para ayudar a tratar enfermedades en el abdomen. Es una forma muy común de hacer la cirugía ahora.
old_gold: Laparoscopic (key hole) surgery is now widely performed to treat various abdominal diseases.

input: We included 20 studies with a total of 2125 participants covering 23 different treatments.
output: For this research project, we looked at 20 different studies. All together, these studies included 2125 people who were trying out 23 different treatments.
gold: Se incluyeron 20 estudios con un total de 2 125 participantes que abarcaban 23 tratamientos diferentes.
translated_output: Para este proyecto de investigación, analizamos 20 estudios diferentes. En conjunto, estos estudios incluyeron a 2125 personas que estaban probando 23 tratamientos diferentes.
old_gold: We included 20 studies with a total of 2125 participants covering 23 different treatments.

input: In the larger USA trial, the 12-month cumulative life-table termination rates per 100 women for overall pregnancy were 17.4 for the sponge and 12.8 for the diaphragm.
output: In a study done in the USA, 100 women were tracked for 12 months. Out of these 100 women, 17.4 got pregnant while using the sponge and only 12.8 got pregnant while using the diaphragm.
gold: En un gran ensayo realizado en EE.UU., la esponja no funcionó tan bien como el diafragma para prevenir el embarazo.
translated_output: En un estudio realizado en los EE. UU., 100 mujeres fueron seguidas durante 12 meses. De estas 100 mujeres, 17,4 quedaron embarazadas mientras usaban la esponja y solo 12,8 quedaron embarazadas mientras usaban el diafragma.
old_gold: In a large USA trial, the sponge did not work as well as the diaphragm in preventing pregnancy.

input: High-quality randomised controlled trials on well-defined participants with long-term outcomes to determine the duration of response are needed.
output: Researchers need to do studies using carefully chosen people and look at how long the results last in order to get a better understanding of the topic.
gold: La crema de combinación triple fue significativamente más eficaz para aclarar el melasma comparada con la hidroquinona sola o con las combinaciones duales como la tretinoina y la hidroquinona, la tretinoina y el acetónido de fluocinolona, o la hidroquinona y el acetónido de fluocinolona.
translated_output: Los investigadores deben realizar estudios con personas cuidadosamente seleccionadas y observar cuánto duran los resultados para comprender mejor el tema.
old_gold: Triple-combination cream was significantly more effective at lightening melasma when compared to hydroquinone alone or to dual combinations such as tretinoin and hydroquinone, tretinoin and fluocinolone acetonide, or hydroquinone and fluocinolone acetonide.

input: All randomised controlled trials of one or more individual outpatient psychological therapies for adults with anorexia nervosa, as defined by DSM-5 or similar international criteria.
output: This sentence is talking about a research experiment that is studying one or more types of therapy for adults with a condition called anorexia nervosa. The experiment is designed to see if the therapy works, and it is making sure that the people in the experiment are chosen at random and that the results are carefully measured. The condition is defined according to the DSM-5, which is a book of rules used by doctors and therapists when diagnosing people with mental health issues.
gold: Se utilizaron las bases de datos de búsqueda para encontrar estudios controlados aleatorizados sobre terapia psicológica individual administrada en contextos ambulatorios a adolescentes mayores y adultos con anorexia nerviosa (finalizada el 16 de julio 2014).
translated_output: Esta oración habla de un experimento de investigación que estudia uno o más tipos de terapia para adultos con una condición llamada anorexia nerviosa. El experimento está diseñado para ver si la terapia funciona, y se asegura de que las personas en el experimento se elijan al azar y que los resultados se midan cuidadosamente. La condición se define de acuerdo con el DSM-5, que es un libro de reglas utilizado por médicos y terapeutas cuando diagnostican a personas con problemas de salud mental.
old_gold: We used search databases to ﬁnd randomised controlled studies of individual psychological therapy delivered in outpatient settings to older adolescents and adults with anorexia nervosa (completed up to July 16 2014).

input: We reran the searches for all databases in March 2016, and when we update the review, we will deal with the two studies of interest found through this search that are awaiting classification.
output: We looked through all the different databases in March 2016, and when we look at the information again, we will decide what to do about two studies we found that we don't know enough about yet.
gold: Se volvieron a ejecutar las búsquedas para todas las bases de datos en marzo 2016 y se encontraron dos estudios que están en espera de clasificación.
translated_output: Revisamos todas las diferentes bases de datos en marzo de 2016, y cuando volvamos a mirar la información, decidiremos qué hacer con dos estudios que descubrimos sobre los que aún no sabemos lo suficiente.
old_gold: We reran the searches for all databases in March 2016 and found two studies that are awaiting classification.

input: Catheter patency is poor following use of thrombolytic agents with studies reporting median catheter survival rates of 14 to 42 days and was reported to improve significantly by fibrin sheath stripping or catheter exchange (37 participants: MD -27.70 days, 95% CI -51.00 to -4.40).
output: When doctors use certain medicines to break up blood clots, the tubes they use to help deliver the medicine don't last very long. On average, the tubes last between 14 and 42 days. However, when doctors do a special procedure to remove the outer layer of the tube, or replace the tube, it can last much longer. In one study, the tubes lasted for an average of 27.7 days, which ranged from 4.4 to 51 days.
gold: La permeabilidad del catéter a las dos semanas probablemente es mejor luego de la eliminación de la vaina de fibrina o el intercambio del catéter en comparación con el agente trombolítico.
translated_output: Cuando los médicos usan ciertos medicamentos para romper los coágulos de sangre, los tubos que usan para ayudar a administrar el medicamento no duran mucho. En promedio, los tubos duran entre 14 y 42 días. Sin embargo, cuando los médicos realizan un procedimiento especial para quitar la capa externa del tubo o reemplazar el tubo, puede durar mucho más. En un estudio, los tubos duraron un promedio de 27,7 días, que osciló entre 4,4 y 51 días.
old_gold: Catheter patency at two weeks is probably better following fibrin sheath stripping or catheter exchange compared to thrombolytic agent.

input: Further trials of the use of fibrates in populations with previous stroke and also against a background treatment with statins (standard of care) are required.
output: Scientists need to do more research to find out if a medicine called fibrates can help people who have had a stroke and are already taking another medicine called statins.
gold: En otras palabras, no existe evidencia convincente para apoyar la administración de los fibratos actualmente disponibles en la prevención de los ataques cardíacos futuros, los accidentes cerebrovasculares y la muerte debido a enfermedades circulatorias en los pacientes con enfermedades circulatorias existentes.
translated_output: Los científicos deben realizar más investigaciones para determinar si un medicamento llamado fibratos puede ayudar a las personas que han sufrido un accidente cerebrovascular y ya están tomando otro medicamento llamado estatinas.
old_gold: In other words, there is no good evidence to support the use of currently available fibrates in the prevention of future heart attacks, strokes, and circulatory disease death in people with existing circulatory disease.

input: We included all randomised clinical trials comparing box model trainers versus no training in surgical trainees with no prior laparoscopic experience.
output: We looked at all studies where people who had never done laparoscopic surgery before were divided into two groups. One group used box model trainers to practice, and the other group did not practice at all.
gold: Si se realizan bien, proporcionan la respuesta más precisa.
translated_output: Se examinaron todos los estudios en los que las personas que nunca antes se habían sometido a una cirugía laparoscópica se dividieron en dos grupos. Un grupo usó entrenadores modelo de caja para practicar, y el otro grupo no practicó nada.
old_gold: If conducted well, they provide the most accurate answer.

input: The contraceptive vaginal sponge was developed as an alternative to the contraceptive diaphragm.
output: The contraceptive vaginal sponge is a type of birth control that people can use instead of the contraceptive diaphragm.
gold: Ayuda a evitar que el esperma entre en el útero.
translated_output: La esponja vaginal anticonceptiva es un tipo de control de la natalidad que las personas pueden usar en lugar del diafragma anticonceptivo.
old_gold: It helps to keep sperm from getting into the womb.

input: Over past years, both intravenous and inhalational anaesthetic agents have been used, but the superiority of one agent over the other is a topic of ongoing debate.
output: For a long time, doctors have used both medicines that you give through a needle and medicines you breathe in to keep people asleep during surgery, but there is still a disagreement about which one is better.
gold: Los agentes inyectables se administran al paciente a través de las venas, mientras que los gases se aplican en los pulmones a través de un tubo colocado en la tráquea.
translated_output: Durante mucho tiempo, los médicos han usado tanto medicamentos que se administran a través de una aguja como medicamentos que se inhalan para mantener a las personas dormidas durante la cirugía, pero todavía hay desacuerdo sobre cuál es mejor.
old_gold: Injectable agents are delivered to the patient through the veins, whereas gases are delivered to the lungs through a tube placed in the windpipe.

input: The review did not provide a good estimate of the incidence of harms associated with loop diuretics because of the short duration of the trials and the lack of reporting of adverse effects in many of the trials.
output: The study did not give a good answer to how many people had bad side effects from taking loop diuretics because the studies done were not long enough and some of the studies did not even report if people had bad side effects.
gold: Debido a la falta de información y la corta duración de estos ensayos, esta revisión no proporciona una buena estimación de los efectos perjudiciales asociados con los diuréticos de asa.
translated_output: El estudio no proporcionó una buena respuesta sobre cuántas personas sufrieron efectos secundarios negativos al tomar diuréticos de asa porque los estudios realizados no fueron lo suficientemente largos y algunos de los estudios ni siquiera informaron si las personas sufrieron efectos secundarios negativos.
old_gold: Due to lack of reporting and the short duration of included trials, this review could not provide an estimate of the harms associated with loop diuretics.

input: There is no high quality evidence to support the use of anabolic steroids in treating pressure ulcers.
output: There is not enough good proof to show that using anabolic steroids can help people with pressure ulcers.
gold: El ensayo finalizó temprano, ya que los autores del ensayo consideraron que los resultados provisionales indicaron que fue poco probable que hubiera un efecto beneficioso a partir del tratamiento con oxandrolona.
translated_output: No hay pruebas suficientes que demuestren que el uso de esteroides anabólicos puede ayudar a las personas con úlceras por presión.
old_gold: The trial was ended early as the trial authors deemed that the interim results suggested that there was unlikely to be a benefit from treatment with oxandrolone.

input: Adverse events associated with RIC were significantly higher in participants treated with RIC (RR 10.91; 95% CI 2.01 to 59.28; 3 trials, 371 participants, low-quality evidence), but no severe adverse event was attributable to RIC treatment.
output: Using RIC (a certain type of treatment) caused more bad events than other treatments, but none of the bad events were very serious.
gold: Los eventos adversos fueron significativamente más frecuentes en el grupo de CIR, pero no se informó que fueran graves.
translated_output: El uso de RIC (un cierto tipo de tratamiento) causó más eventos malos que otros tratamientos, pero ninguno de los eventos malos fue muy grave.
old_gold: Adverse events were significantly more common in the RIC group but were not reported to be severe.

input: When comparing individual psychological therapies with each other, no specific treatment was consistently superior to any other specific approach.
output: When looking at different types of therapy for people's mental health, none of them was always better than the others.
gold: Con una excepción, se encontraron pocas diferencias entre las terapias psicológicas específicas.
translated_output: Al observar diferentes tipos de terapia para la salud mental de las personas, ninguno de ellos fue siempre mejor que los demás.
old_gold: With one exception, we found little difference between specific psychological therapies.

input: Two of the 10 trials included children.
output: Out of 10 experiments, two of them included children.
gold: Se utilizaron las bases de datos de búsqueda para encontrar estudios controlados aleatorizados sobre terapia psicológica individual administrada en contextos ambulatorios a adolescentes mayores y adultos con anorexia nerviosa (finalizada el 16 de julio 2014).
translated_output: De 10 experimentos, dos de ellos incluyeron niños.
old_gold: We used search databases to ﬁnd randomised controlled studies of individual psychological therapy delivered in outpatient settings to older adolescents and adults with anorexia nervosa (completed up to July 16 2014).

input: Therefore, other gases have been introduced as alternatives to carbon dioxide for establishing pneumoperitoneum.
output: Therefore, scientists are looking for new gases that can be used instead of carbon dioxide to make a person's abdomen full of air.
gold: Por lo tanto, otros gases se han sugerido como alternativas al dióxido de carbono.
translated_output: Por lo tanto, los científicos están buscando nuevos gases que puedan usarse en lugar del dióxido de carbono para llenar de aire el abdomen de una persona.
old_gold: So, other gases have been suggested as alternatives to carbon dioxide.

input: There were no randomised trials comparing either anticoagulants or antiplatelet drugs with control, thus there is no evidence to support their routine use for the treatment of extracranial internal carotid artery dissection.
output: Researchers did not test any medicines to see if they would help the treatment of a particular medical problem called extracranial internal carotid artery dissection. Because of this, we don't have any proof that these medicines are useful in helping people with this medical problem.
gold: Solamente se encontraron ensayos no aleatorios de calidad deficiente que compararon anticoagulantes con aspirina.
translated_output: Los investigadores no probaron ningún medicamento para ver si ayudarían en el tratamiento de un problema médico en particular llamado disección de la arteria carótida interna extracraneal. Debido a esto, no tenemos ninguna prueba de que estos medicamentos sean útiles para ayudar a las personas con este problema médico.
old_gold: We found only poor quality non-randomised studies that compared anticoagulants with aspirin.

input: Over past years, both intravenous and inhalational anaesthetic agents have been used, but the superiority of one agent over the other is a topic of ongoing debate.
output: For a long time, doctors have been using two types of medicine to help people sleep during surgery. However, it is still not known which type of medicine is better and it is still a subject of discussion.
gold: Las ventajas de un enfoque sobre el otro todavía no están claras.
translated_output: Durante mucho tiempo, los médicos han estado usando dos tipos de medicamentos para ayudar a las personas a dormir durante la cirugía. Sin embargo, aún no se sabe qué tipo de medicamento es mejor y sigue siendo un tema de discusión.
old_gold: Advantages of one over the other approach remain questionable.

input: There was no increase in adverse events with fibrates compared to control.
output: When people took medicine called fibrates, the same number of bad things happened to them as when people did not take the medicine.
gold: Actualmente no hay evidencia clara del efecto beneficioso de los fibratos en dichos pacientes.
translated_output: Cuando las personas tomaban medicamentos llamados fibratos, les sucedía la misma cantidad de cosas malas que cuando no tomaban los medicamentos.
old_gold: There is currently no clear evidence for benefit of fibrates in such people.

input: All the 16 trials in this comparison used video trainers.
output: In this comparison, 16 different tests were done and each test used a video to show how to do it.
gold: Los ensayos compararon el entrenamiento con simulador versus ningún entrenamiento (16 ensayos; 464 participantes) o versus diferentes tipos de entrenamiento con simulador (14 ensayos; 382 participantes) (algunos ensayos y participantes se incluyeron en ambas comparaciones debido a que los ensayos comparaban diferentes métodos de entrenamiento con simulador versus ningún entrenamiento).
translated_output: En esta comparación, se realizaron 16 pruebas diferentes y cada prueba utilizó un video para mostrar cómo hacerlo.
old_gold: The trials compared box model training versus no training (16 trials; 464 participants) or versus different types of box model training (14 trials; 382 participants) (some trials and participants were included in both comparisons as the trials compared different methods of box training versus no training).

input: There was insufficient evidence to determine the effects of nitrous oxide and carbon dioxide on cardiopulmonary complications (RR 2.00, 95% CI 0.38 to 10.43; two studies; 140 participants; very low quality of evidence), or surgical morbidity (RR 1.01, 95% CI 0.18 to 5.71; two studies; 143 participants; very low quality of evidence).
output: This sentence talks about a scientific study that looked at how nitrous oxide and carbon dioxide might affect people's hearts and lungs. The study found that there was not enough evidence to be sure if nitrous oxide and carbon dioxide had any effect on heart and lung problems. There wasn't enough evidence to know if nitrous oxide and carbon dioxide had any effect on the number of people who had problems after surgery either.
gold: No está claro si existen o no diferencias en el número de personas con complicaciones cardiopulmonares (corazón y pulmones) o complicaciones quirúrgicas entre el dióxido de carbono y el óxido nitroso.
translated_output: Esta oración habla de un estudio científico que analizó cómo el óxido nitroso y el dióxido de carbono podrían afectar el corazón y los pulmones de las personas. El estudio encontró que no había suficiente evidencia para estar seguro de si el óxido nitroso y el dióxido de carbono tenían algún efecto sobre los problemas cardíacos y pulmonares. Tampoco hubo suficiente evidencia para saber si el óxido nitroso y el dióxido de carbono tuvieron algún efecto sobre la cantidad de personas que tuvieron problemas después de la cirugía.
old_gold: We are uncertain as to whether there are differences in the number of people with heart or lung complications or surgical complications between nitrous oxide and carbon dioxide.

input: We included 15 RCTs with 1833 participants.
output: We found 15 studies that involved 1833 people to see if a certain treatment works.
gold: Se encontraron 15 estudios elegibles con 1833 participantes.
translated_output: Se encontraron 15 estudios en los que participaron 1833 personas para ver si un determinado tratamiento funciona.
old_gold: We found 15 eligible studies with 1833 participants.

input: They can be grouped into those including a bleaching agent such as hydroquinone, triple-combination creams (hydroquinone, tretinoin, and fluocinolone acetonide), and combination therapies (hydroquinone cream and glycolic acid peels), as well as less conventional therapies including rucinol, vitamin C iontophoresis, and skin-lightening complexes like Thiospot and Gigawhite.
output: This sentence is talking about different kinds of treatments used to lighten the skin. Some treatments use a bleaching agent like hydroquinone, others use a combination of three different things (hydroquinone, tretinoin, and fluocinolone acetonide), and some use a combination of a cream and peels with glycolic acid. There are also some less common treatments such as rucinol, vitamin C iontophoresis, and special creams like Thiospot and Gigawhite.
gold: tretinoina) y exfoliaciones faciales donde se utiliza una solución ácida para extraer las capas exteriores de la piel (p.ej.
translated_output: Esta oración habla de diferentes tipos de tratamientos que se usan para aclarar la piel. Algunos tratamientos usan un agente blanqueador como la hidroquinona, otros usan una combinación de tres cosas diferentes (hidroquinona, tretinoína y acetónido de fluocinolona), y algunos usan una combinación de crema y exfoliación con ácido glicólico. También existen algunos tratamientos menos comunes como el rucinol, la iontoforesis con vitamina C y cremas especiales como Thiospot y Gigawhite.
old_gold: tretinoin), and facial peels where an acid solution is used to remove outer layers of the skin (e.g.

input: High-quality randomised controlled trials on well-defined participants with long-term outcomes to determine the duration of response are needed.
output: Scientists need to do a special kind of experiment on a group of people to find out how long a certain treatment will work for.
gold: Además, los resultados de los estudios deben incluir los criterios de los participantes de forma estandarizada porque ellos pueden percibir el grado de aclaramiento de la piel de forma diferente a los investigadores del ensayo.
translated_output: Los científicos necesitan hacer un tipo especial de experimento en un grupo de personas para averiguar durante cuánto tiempo funcionará un determinado tratamiento.
old_gold: Addtionally, study outcomes should include participants' views in a standardised manner because they may perceive the degree of skin lightening differently to the trial investigators.

input: One study reported a non-significant decrease in fever in the sclerotherapy group (60 participants: RR 0.25, 95% CI 0.06 to 1.08).
output: In one study, 60 people who had a medical procedure called sclerotherapy experienced a slight decrease in fever, but this decrease was not large enough to be considered significant.
gold: Las complicaciones posoperatorias como la infección y la fiebre, así como el costo y el tiempo hasta el retorno al trabajo fueron menos significativas en el grupo de aspiración y escleroterapia; sin embargo, la tasa de recurrencia fue mayor.
translated_output: En un estudio, 60 personas que se sometieron a un procedimiento médico llamado escleroterapia experimentaron una leve disminución de la fiebre, pero esta disminución no fue lo suficientemente grande como para considerarse significativa.
old_gold: Postoperative complications such as infection and fever, as well as cost and time to work resumption were less in the aspiration and sclerotherapy group; however the recurrence rate was higher.

input: The contraceptive vaginal sponge was developed as an alternative to the contraceptive diaphragm.
output: The contraceptive vaginal sponge is a different kind of birth control that was created to give people another option besides using a contraceptive diaphragm.
gold: La esponja contiene una sustancia química para matar los espermatozoides.
translated_output: La esponja vaginal anticonceptiva es un tipo diferente de control de la natalidad que se creó para brindarles a las personas otra opción además de usar un diafragma anticonceptivo.
old_gold: The sponge contains a chemical to kill sperm.

input: Evidence from one trial of small sample size suggests that room air pneumoperitoneum may decrease hospital costs in people undergoing laparoscopic abdominal surgery.
output: This sentence is talking about a study that looked at a small group of people who had laparoscopic abdominal surgery, which is a type of operation done on the abdomen. The study found that using room air instead of a special gas during the operation may help to reduce the amount of money spent on the surgery.
gold: El aire ambiental parecía estar asociado con menores costos totales de hospitalización en comparación con el dióxido de carbono para la insuflación de la cavidad abdominal.
translated_output: Esta oración se refiere a un estudio que analizó a un pequeño grupo de personas que se sometieron a una cirugía abdominal laparoscópica, que es un tipo de operación que se realiza en el abdomen. El estudio encontró que el uso de aire ambiental en lugar de un gas especial durante la operación puede ayudar a reducir la cantidad de dinero gastado en la cirugía.
old_gold: Room air seemed to be associated with lower total hospital costs compared with carbon dioxide for insufflation of the abdominal cavity.

input: Orthognathic surgery (OS) is a term that refers to many elective surgical techniques to correct facial deformity; the associated malocclusion and functional disorders related to the stomatognathic system.
output: Orthognathic surgery is a type of surgery that is done to fix parts of the face that have been deformed. It can also help with problems with the mouth and teeth that don't work correctly.
gold: Muchos pacientes son sometidos a cirugía de las mandíbulas cada año para corregir malformaciones.
translated_output: La cirugía ortognática es un tipo de cirugía que se realiza para reparar partes de la cara que se han deformado. También puede ayudar con los problemas de la boca y los dientes que no funcionan correctamente.
old_gold: Many people undergo surgery of the jaws each year to correct malformations.

input: Overall the evidence in this study was of very low quality (downgraded for imprecision and indirectness).
output: This study used evidence that was not very reliable. The evidence was not very clear and did not give enough information.
gold: En general, la evidencia obtenida a partir de este estudio se consideró de calidad muy baja.
translated_output: Este estudio utilizó evidencia que no era muy confiable. La evidencia no era muy clara y no daba suficiente información.
old_gold: Overall, the evidence from this study was judged to be of very low quality.

input: Compared with the control group, the box trainer group also had lower error score (3 trials; 69 participants; SMD -0.69; 95% CI -1.21 to -0.17), better accuracy score (3 trials; 73 participants; SMD 0.67; 95% CI 0.18 to 1.17), and better composite performance scores (SMD 0.65; 95% CI 0.42 to 0.88).
output: The box trainer group did better than the control group in three different tests. They had fewer mistakes, were more accurate, and overall did better than the control group.
gold: El entrenamiento con simulador parece disminuir el tiempo requerido para realizar una tarea laparoscópica, mejorar la exactitud, y disminuir los errores, y mejora el rendimiento general.
translated_output: El grupo de box trainer lo hizo mejor que el grupo de control en tres pruebas diferentes. Tuvieron menos errores, fueron más precisos y, en general, lo hicieron mejor que el grupo de control.
old_gold: Box model training appears to decrease the time required to perform a laparoscopic task, improve the accuracy, decrease the errors, and improves the overall performance.

input: This updated review includes 50 studies (45,285 participants); of these 38 (37,274 participants) were meta-analysed.
output: This sentence is about a review, which is a summary of a lot of different studies. The review has been updated, and it looks at 50 studies with 45,285 people in them. Out of those 50 studies, 38 of them had 37,274 people who were studied in more detail.
gold: Se revisaron 50 estudios publicados antes de junio de 2012 relacionados con el tratamiento con estatinas en más de 45 000 pacientes con NC que no necesitaban tratamiento con diálisis.
translated_output: Esta oración se trata de una revisión, que es un resumen de muchos estudios diferentes. La revisión se ha actualizado y analiza 50 estudios con 45 285 personas en ellos. De esos 50 estudios, 38 de ellos tenían 37,274 personas que fueron estudiadas con más detalle.
old_gold: We looked at 50 studies published before June 2012 concerning statin treatment in over 45,000 people with CKD who did not need dialysis treatment.

input: Risk of bias varied across studies, with some studies lacking details of allocation concealment.
output: The amount of risk that the results of the studies could be influenced by something other than the facts was different for each study. Some studies didn't give enough information to make sure that people couldn't see which group the participants were in.
gold: Se observaron variaciones en el riesgo de sesgo de los estudios incluidos.
translated_output: La cantidad de riesgo de que los resultados de los estudios pudieran estar influenciados por algo diferente a los hechos fue diferente para cada estudio. Algunos estudios no brindaron suficiente información para asegurarse de que las personas no pudieran ver en qué grupo estaban los participantes.
old_gold: We noted variation in the risk of bias of included studies.

input: This Cochrane review aimed to determine whether brief co-incubation of sperm and oocytes improves outcomes compared with the standard overnight insemination protocol for women undergoing IVF.
output: This study wanted to find out if mixing sperm and eggs for a short amount of time instead of overnight would help women who are having a baby through in-vitro fertilization (IVF).
gold: El acortamiento del tiempo de coincubación de los ovocitos y los espermatozoides pudiera mejorar los resultados de la FIV al reducir el efecto perjudicial de las EOR sobre los cigotos y la calidad de los embriones.
translated_output: Este estudio quería averiguar si mezclar esperma y óvulos durante un corto período de tiempo en lugar de toda la noche ayudaría a las mujeres que van a tener un bebé a través de la fertilización in vitro (FIV).
old_gold: Shortening the co-incubation time of oocytes and sperm may possibly improve IVF outcomes by reducing the detrimental effect of ROS on the zygotes and the quality of the embryos.

input: The MSP/RESA (Combination B) vaccine shows promise as a way to reduce the severity of malaria episodes, but the effect of the vaccine is MSP2 variant-specific.
output: The MSP/RESA (Combination B) vaccine may help stop malaria from making people sick as much, but it only works against certain kinds of malaria.
gold: La vacuna redujo la densidad de parásitos en la sangre, pero no previno los ataques de malaria.
translated_output: La vacuna MSP/RESA (Combinación B) puede ayudar a evitar que la malaria enferme tanto a las personas, pero solo funciona contra ciertos tipos de malaria.
old_gold: It reduced the density of parasites in the blood, but it did not prevent malaria attacks.

input: To assess interventions used in the management of all types of melasma: epidermal, dermal, and mixed.
output: To figure out which treatments work best for melasma, which is a type of skin discoloration, we need to look at different kinds of melasma, like ones that are on the outer layer of the skin and ones that are deeper.
gold: El melasma epidérmico es el más superficial con un aumento del pigmento de la piel (melanina) en la capa superior de la piel (epidermis).
translated_output: Para determinar qué tratamientos funcionan mejor para el melasma, que es un tipo de decoloración de la piel, debemos observar diferentes tipos de melasma, como los que se encuentran en la capa externa de la piel y los que son más profundos.
old_gold: Epidermal melasma is the most superficial with an increase in the skin pigment (melanin) in the top layer of skin (epidermis).

input: Potential harms from statin therapy were limited by lack of systematic reporting and were uncertain in analyses that had few events: elevated creatine kinase (7 studies, 4514 participants; RR 0.84, 95% CI 0.20 to 3.48), liver function abnormalities (7 studies, RR 0.76, 95% CI 0.39 to 1.50), withdrawal due to adverse events (13 studies, 4219 participants; RR 1.16, 95% CI 0.84 to 1.60), and cancer (2 studies, 5581 participants; RR 1.03, 95% CI 0.82 to 130).
output: This sentence is talking about statin therapy, which is a type of medicine. It is saying that when researchers looked at how statin therapy affects people, they found that it did not cause too many problems. The researchers looked at four problems in particular - elevated creatine kinase, liver function abnormalities, withdrawal due to adverse events, and cancer - and they found that when people took statin therapy, they were less likely to have these problems compared to people who did not take it.
gold: Las estatinas presentan algunos efectos perjudiciales potenciales sobre la función hepática y muscular y algunos tipos de cáncer.
translated_output: Esta oración se refiere a la terapia con estatinas, que es un tipo de medicamento. Dice que cuando los investigadores observaron cómo la terapia con estatinas afecta a las personas, descubrieron que no causaba demasiados problemas. Los investigadores observaron cuatro problemas en particular: creatina quinasa elevada, anomalías en la función hepática, abstinencia debido a eventos adversos y cáncer, y encontraron que cuando las personas tomaban terapia con estatinas, tenían menos probabilidades de tener estos problemas en comparación con las personas que no la tomaban. tómalo.
old_gold: Statins have some potential harmful effects on liver and muscle function, and some cancers.

input: There were no cardiopulmonary complications or serious adverse events observed related to either room air or carbon dioxide pneumoperitoneum (both outcomes very low quality of evidence).

input: Further well-designed trials of low risk of bias and random errors are necessary.
output: In order to make sure the results are accurate, more experiments need to be done that are carefully designed and have a low chance of making mistakes.

input: Surgical training has traditionally been one of apprenticeship, where the surgical trainee learns to perform surgery under the supervision of a trained surgeon.
output: In the past, learning how to do surgery was like an apprenticeship. That means a person who wanted to learn surgery would work with an experienced surgeon, who would teach them and help them practice their skills.
gold: Tradicionalmente, el entrenamiento quirúrgico ha sido de aprendizaje, donde el cirujano practicante aprende a realizar la cirugía bajo la supervisión de un cirujano entrenado.
translated_output: En el pasado, aprender a hacer cirugía era como un aprendizaje. Eso significa que una persona que quisiera aprender cirugía trabajaría con un cirujano experimentado, quien le enseñaría y le ayudaría a practicar sus habilidades.
old_gold: Surgical training has traditionally been one of apprenticeship, where the surgical trainee learns to perform the surgery under the supervision of a trained surgeon.
